programme.title: Kritiķis
programme.desc: Sers Ians Makellens (Gredzenu Pavēlnieks) atveido ietekmīgu Londonas teātra kritiķi, kurš atriebības vārdā sapin šantāžas tīklus ar letālām sekām.

programme.title: Aptiekārs Melhiors. Spoks
programme.desc: Viduslaiku trilleru otrajā filmā nakts sardzi pārbaida briesmīgs spoks – traģiski noslīkusī bagāta tirgotāja meita. No rīta sargs ir miris, nokritis no augsta torņa, un vēl vairāki cilvēki zaudē dzīvību aizdomīgos negadījumos. Izmeklējot notikumus, Melhiora ceļi krustojas ar prostitūtu, priesteri, ārzemju mākslinieku un traku ķeceri. Pēdas ved uz Piritas klosteri, kura drūmās velves glabā aizmirstībā apraktu, bīstamu noslēpumu. Tajā pašā laikā Melhioru moka jautājums – kāpēc viņa mīļotā Keterlīna pēkšņi pārtrauc viņu saderināšanos?

programme.title: Kliko kundze
programme.desc: Pēc vīra pāragrās nāves Barba Nikola Ponsardēna Kliko pretstatā pieņemtajām normām pārņem jaunā vīndarīšanas uzņēmuma grožus, ko abi ar vīru bija veidojuši. Vadot uzņēmumu cauri politiskām un finanšu grūtībām, viņa ignorē kritiķus un rada revolūciju šampanieša industrijā, kļūstot par vienu no pasaules pirmajām, dižajām darījumu sievietēm. Filmas pamatā ir Tilaras Dž. Maceo "The New York Times" bestsellers "Atraitne Kliko".

programme.title: Pagraba durvis
programme.desc: Meklējot jaunu dzīves sākumu pēc spontānā aborta, pāris saņem dāvanā savu sapņu māju ar vienu nosacījumu – viņi nekad nedrīkst atvērt pagraba durvis. Vai viņi var dzīvot, nezinot, kas tur ir? Šī iekšā cīņa ar neziņu izraisa šokējošas sekas.

programme.title: Zirnekļtīkls
programme.desc: Astoņus gadus vecais Pīters ik vakaru savas istabas sienās dzird dīvainu klauvēšanu. Viņa vecāki Kerola un Marks apgalvo, ka pie vainas Pītera spilgtā iztēle, taču zēns ir pārliecināts: šajā mājā kaut kas nav kārtībā. Un pamazām atklājas tumšs noslēpums, ko tik cītīgi glabājuši viņa vecāki.

programme.title: Nejaukais es
programme.desc: Mīlīgā mazpilsētiņā atrodas melna māja ar nedzīvu zālāju. Kaimiņi pat nenojauš, ka zem mājas atrodas milzu paslēptuve. Sīku pakalpiņu armijas apsargāts, Grū kaldina plānus lielākajai laupīšanai pasaules vēsturē. Viņš ir iecerējis nolaupīt Mēnesi. Jā, Mēnesi! Grū patīk viss ļaunais. Bruņojies ar samazināšanas lāzeru, sasaldēšanas staru un dažnedažādiem kaujas transporta līdzekļiem braukšanai pa zemi un pa gaisu, viņš iznīdē visu, kas gadās ceļā, līdz kādu dienu sastop trīs bārenītes ar apbrīnojamu gribasspēku…

programme.title: Nejaukais es
programme.desc: Kamēr bijušais dižais ļaundaris Gru sāk iejusties ģimenes cilvēka lomā un mēģina godīgi pelnīt iztiku, pārdodot ievārījumu, Antarktīdā kāds nozog slepenu laboratoriju. Ļaunuma apkarošanas organizācijai ir nepieciešama palīdzība, un tās pārstāvji ierodas pie Gru. Kopā ar organizācijas ekscentrisko aģenti Lūsiju Vaildu viņš secina, ka galvenais aizdomās turamais ir par mirušu uzskatītais supernelietis El Mačo, kura dēls ir ieskatījies Gru vecākajā meitā Margo. Pārlieka vēlēšanās pasargāt meitas un arvien pieaugošās simpātijas pret Lūsiju aizmiglo Gru prātu, tādēļ meklējumi nevedas. Tikmēr kāds nelietis paklusām nolaupa Gru palīgus.

programme.title: Minioni
programme.desc: Minjoni, kas attīstījās no dzelteniem vienšūnas organismiem, dzīvo uz Zemes kopš aizvēsturiskiem laikiem. Viņu dzīves jēga ir kalpošana, taču mazie radījumi nemitīgi atrod sev nekam nederīgus saimniekus, sākot no dinozaura un beidzot ar Napoleonu. Ja minjoniem nav saimnieka, kuram zemoties, viņi ieslīgst dziļā depresijā. Taču minjonam Kevinam ir plāns – kopā ar draugiem Stjuartu un Bobu viņš dodas meklēt jaunu ļauno saimnieku, kuram sekot. Tā viņi atrod Skārletu Nomušītu, kas ir pasaulē pirmā superļaundare.

programme.title: Bada garša
programme.desc: Kāds pāris ziedo visu, tikai lai saņemtu visaugstāko atzinību pavārmākslas pasaulē — Michelin zvaigzni.

programme.title: Dzīves grāmata
programme.desc: Meksikas pilsētā Sanandželā Manolo, Marija un Džoakvins laiku pavadījuši kopā jau kopš bērnības. Lai arī viņu dzīves ir bijušas atšķirīgas - Marija tika nosūtīta uz Eiropu, Džoakvins pievienojās armijai, bet Manolo studēja un kļuva par cīkstoni - viena lieta nemainījās. Manolo un Džoakvins abi vēlas apprecēt Mariju.

programme.title: Sliktais ģēnijs
programme.desc: Grupa vidusskolas pēdējo klašu skolēnu no uzņēmējdarbības programmas apvienojas, lai izjauktu krāpniecisku augstskolu uzņemšanas sistēmu.

programme.title: Singstrīta
programme.desc: Dublina, 1985. gads. Ekonomiskā krīze Īrijā arvien vairāk cilvēku iedzen bankrotā, tikmēr 15 gadus vecais Konors kopā ar brāli un māsu dzīvo pie vecākiem, kuru laulībai draud izjukšana. Lai ietaupītu naudu, Konoram nākas mainīt skolu. Tur viņš ātri vien kļūst par izstumto. Kādu dienu viņš pamana Rafīnu, kura šad tad stāv iepretim skolai, raudzīdamās tālumā un smēķēdama vienu cigareti pēc otras. Viņa ir skaista, divus gadus vecāka par Konoru, viņai ir draugs, un viņa strādā par modeli. Īsāk sakot: viņa ir gandrīz nesasniedzama. Taču Konors nav gatavs padoties un piedāvā meitenei piedalīties viņa grupas videoklipā. Rafīna piekrīt, un Konors ir panikā, jo grupas viņam nemaz nav...

programme.title: Kaut tu būtu šeit
programme.desc: Jauna dāma, meklējot dzīvei uguntiņu, pavada romantisku nakti kopā ar kādu jaunekli. Atklādama, ka vīrietis ir nedziedināmi slims, sieviete apņemas palīdzēt viņam pilnvērtīgi nodzīvot pēdējās šeit atvēlētās dienas.

programme.title: Meitene, vārdā Vilo
programme.desc: Vilo manto mežu, māju un burvju spējas no savas vecmāmiņas Alvinas. Viņai jāatrod vēl trīs meitenes ar maģiskām dāvanām, lai izglābtu mežu. Par laimi, viņai līdzās ir lapsa Rufuss.

programme.title: Abigeila
programme.desc: Ļaundaru grupa nolaupa ietekmīga noziedzīgās pasaules pārstāvja 12 gadus veco meitu baletdejotāju. Viņu mērķis ir paturēt meiteni ieslodzījumā uz vienu nakti, lai tiktu pie 50 miljonu dolāru lielas izpirkuma maksas. Taču mājā, kurā viņi ir apmetušies, notiek savādas lietas - cits pēc cita pazūd nolaupītāji, un ar pieaugošām šausmām viņi atklāj, ka ir ieslēgti kopā ar kādu, kas nav tipiska maza meitenīte.

programme.title: Melnais lācis
programme.desc: Radošu krīzi piedzīvojoša filmu veidotāja meklē vienatni kādā lauku retrītā, taču saprot, ka mežs tikai piešķir spēku viņas iekšējiem dēmoniem.

programme.title: Lisa Frankenšteina
programme.desc: Mīlas stāsts starp pusaudzi un viņas iemīļoto, un tā iznācis, ka viņš ir... mironis. Šausminošu apstākļu sakritības mīļoto atgriež dzīvē, un abi dodas ceļojumā, lai atrastu mīlestību, laimi un dažas trūkstošās ķermeņa daļas.

programme.title: Amerikas maģisko melnādaino biedrība
programme.desc: Jauns vīrietis tiek uzņemts noslēpumainā biedrībā, kurā darbojas maģiski melnādainie cilvēki, kas veltī savu dzīvi augstākā mērķa īstenošanai: atvieglot baltajiem cilvēkiem dzīvi.

programme.title: Gambīts
programme.desc: Mākslas kuratoram Harijam Dīnam ik dienu nākas paciest sava līdz ausīm bagātā priekšnieka Laionela ekscentriskās izdarības. Nu viņš plāno atriebties, taču šim uzdevumam viņam ir vajadzīga karstasinīgas rodeo karalienes Pīdžejas palīdzība. Harijs liek senam draugam izgatavot pazudušas Monē gleznas kopiju un pamudina priekšnieku to "nejauši" ievērot. Ja darījums izdosies, Harijs un viņa līdzdalībnieki būs par dažiem miljoniem mārciņu bagātāki.

programme.title: Viens pats mājās
programme.desc: Ziemassvētku brīvdienās dodoties uz Parīzi, Makkalisteru ģimene nejauši aizmirst mājās savu astoņgadīgo dēlu Kevinu. Tiesa, tas zēnam neliedz sarīkot pašam savas Ziemassvētku svinības. Beidzot viņu neviens vairs nekomandē, neierobežo un nepieskata! Viss būtu ideāli, ja vien rūdītie kramplauži Harijs un Mārvs nebūtu ieplānojuši apzagt visas tuvākās apkaimes mājas pašā svētku vakarā.

programme.title: Viens pats mājās
programme.desc: Iepriekšējos Ziemassvētkos, dodoties brīvdienās uz Franciju, Makkalisteri aizmirsa mājās savu jaunāko atvasi Kevinu. Šogad, dodoties uz Floridu, viņi dēlu pazaudē lidostā. Kamēr ģimene lido uz Maiami, Kevins ar tēva kredītkartēm kabatā ir ceļā uz Ņujorku. Lielajā pilsētā viņš atrod jaunus draugus, iekārtojas lepnākajā viesnīcā un sastop arī savus vecos paziņas – divus aprobežotos kramplaužus. Šoreiz abi ļaundari Ziemassvētku vakarā plāno apzagt lielāko rotaļlietu veikalu Ņujorkā. Turklāt viņi jau sen alkst atriebties Kevinam – zēnam, kura dēļ nonāca cietumā.

programme.title: Viens pats mājās
programme.desc: ASV Valsts Aizsardzības dienestam ir nozagta slepena mikroshēma. Noziedznieki cer to pārdot un nopelnīt miljoniem dolāru, taču vērtīgā prece nejauši ir nokļuvusi rotaļlietu mašīnā, kas patlaban atrodas kādā mājīgā Čikāgas savrupnamā. Noziedznieki dodas mikroshēmu atgūt. Ceļā viņiem stājas bīstams pretinieks Alekss – astoņgadīgs puišelis, kuram netrūkst izdomas un kurš ir viens pats mājās.

programme.title: 10 dzīvības
programme.desc: Lutināts kaķis Bekets par pašsaprotamu uzskata laimīgo lozi, kas viņam iedalīta, kopš viņu izglāba un iemīlēja Roza, labsirdīga un aizrautīga studente. Kad kaķis zaudē savu devīto dzīvību, liktenis iejaucas, lai viņu aizvestu pārmācošā piedzīvojumā.

programme.title: Vīrs, kurš izgudroja Ziemassvētkus
programme.desc: Stāsts par to, kā Čārlzs Dikenss uzrakstīja "Ziemassvētku stāstu", kas kļuva par īstu Ziemassvētku gara atainojumu.

programme.title: X+Y
programme.desc: Zēns, matemātikas ģēnijs ar saskarsmes grūtībām dzīvē un vienaudžu vidū, rod pašpārliecību un jaunus draugus starp britu skolēnu komandas biedriem Starptautiskajā matemātikas olimpiādē.

programme.title: Veiksme
programme.desc: Labsirdīgs, bet diezgan neveikls eņģelis Gabriels iejaucas grūtībās nonākuša darbinieka un turīga riska kapitālista dzīvē.

programme.title: Māceklis
programme.desc: Stāsts par meistaru un viņa mācekli Ņujorkas nekustamo īpašumu džungļos. 70. gadu sākumā Donalds Tramps ir iesācējs – kompleksu mākts lietu kārtotājs, kurš atrodas tētuka Trampa seniora pavēnī. Iepazīstoties ar advokātu Roju Konu, viņa dzīve mainās. Zogot no citiem idejas, spārnotus teicienus (arī no Reigana) un pārņemot Kona taktiku, Tramps kļūst par savu "labāko versiju". AIDS epidēmija, šovbiznesa ziedonis un itāļu marmora modernās pilis. Pilsēta, kas nekad neguļ, ir Trampa spēļu laukums – tiesa, tajā viņam pašam kļūst par šauru.

programme.title: Krauklis
programme.desc: Dvēseles radinieki Ēriks Dravens un Šellija Vēbstere tiek nežēlīgi nogalināti. Saņemot iespēju upurēt sevi un glābt savu mūža mīlestību, Ēriks dodas ceļā, šķērsojot dzīvo un mirušo pasauli, lai atriebtos un izcīnītu taisnību.

programme.title: Pagraba durvis
programme.desc: Meklējot jaunu dzīves sākumu pēc spontānā aborta, pāris saņem dāvanā savu sapņu māju ar vienu nosacījumu – viņi nekad nedrīkst atvērt pagraba durvis. Vai viņi var dzīvot, nezinot, kas tur ir? Šī iekšā cīņa ar neziņu izraisa šokējošas sekas.

programme.title: LaLiga. Elche - Barcelona
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

programme.title: Ekstrēmais sports: FIS PK. Val di Fassa (ITA) Ski Cross
UFC Žurnāls. Laika atskaite: Alexander Volkanovski-Diego Lopes
programme.desc: Martial Arts based TV programme. UFC stands for the Ultimate Fighting Championship which is an American mixed martial arts (MMA) promotion company based in Las Vegas that is owned by William Morris Endeavour.The purpose of UFC fighting was to establish the most effective martial art in a contest that had no weight classes and minimal rules that were as follows: no biting, hair pulling, groin shots and eye gouging. Legendary fighters well known for their ability to win in UFC fighting are Anderson Silva, Brock Lesnar, Connor McGregor and Ken Shamrock. Womens MMA has seen Ronda Rousey defend her title from 2012 to 2015 before she was defeated by Holly Holm another belt holder in more than one martial art.

programme.desc: Martial Arts based TV programme. programme.desc: Tune in and see all the action and highlights from the round of FIS Snowboarding World Cup held in Rogla, Slovenia.

programme.desc: The National League is a professional ice hockey league in Switzerland and is the top tier of the Swiss league system.

programme.desc: Action from an NCAA Championship event.

programme.title: Futbols: Bundesliga. Augsburg - St.Pauli
programme.desc: Germany has the most attended football league in the world, in the Bundesliga. We bring these authentic fab experiences to your living room with all the key moments of the 2019-20 season, to ensure that your appetite for German football is well and truly met. The likes of Borussia Dortmund and Bayern Munich are met with stern competition this season, as RB Leipzig look to build on their third-placed finish from last season. This programme brings all the games of the german top-flight into one place, so that you can easily catch up with the weeks action. As we reach the business end-of-the-season, watch the victors and losers dictate the final table. With relegation spots and Champions League places yet to be decided, it promises to be a rather exciting conclusion for all those concerned.

programme.title: Futbols: Serie A. Žurnāls Full Impact. 22. raidījums
programme.desc: All the goals and talking points from the latest action in Serie A.

programme.title: NBA .. Heat - Bulls
programme.desc: The National Basketball Association composes of thirty teams across North America for men who are professional in this specific sport. Due to its popularity, this is one of four major professional sport leagues available in the United States of America and Canada. Furthermore, research suggests that it is widely considered to be the premier mens basketball league in the world. programme.title: NBA .. Rockets - Mavericks

programme.title: Basketbols: Eirolīga. Baskonia - Zalgiris Kaunas
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. The competition replaced the FIBA EuroLeague (which was previously called the FIBA European Champions Cup, or simply the European Cup), which had been run by FIBA since 1958. Starting from 2010/2011 season the tournament is named Turkish Airlines Euroleague, due to a sponsorship contract of Turkish Airlines with EuroLeague, and in 2013 the contract was prolonged to 2020. The tournament is aired in 199 countries of the world. The current EuroLeague structure is made up of 16 teams, which each play each other twice, once at home and once away, in a double round robin league regular season, each team plays 30 games. The top 8 placed teams at the end of the regular season advance to playoffs, each plays a 5 game playoff series against a single opponent. The winners of each playoff series advance to the Final Four held in a predetermined city for two days. The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

programme.title: Futbols: LaLiga. Levante - Atletico Madrid
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

programme.title: UFC. Alexander Volkanovski-Diego Lopes
programme.desc: Martial Arts based TV programme. UFC stands for the Ultimate Fighting Championship which is an American mixed martial arts (MMA) promotion company based in Las Vegas that is owned by William Morris Endeavour.The purpose of UFC fighting was to establish the most effective martial art in a contest that had no weight classes and minimal rules that were as follows: no biting, hair pulling, groin shots and eye gouging. Legendary fighters well known for their ability to win in UFC fighting are Anderson Silva, Brock Lesnar, Connor McGregor and Ken Shamrock. Womens MMA has seen Ronda Rousey defend her title from 2012 to 2015 before she was defeated by Holly Holm another belt holder in more than one martial art.

House Hunters: Amazing Water Homes
programme.desc: An Ohio couple look for a waterfront home, with enough space for their adult children and in-laws, in Navarre Beach, Florida.

programme.title: Fix My Frankenhouse
programme.desc: Boston-based home renovation experts and husband-wife team Mike and Denese Butler fix what they refer to as "Frankenstein" houses. These are older homes that have become filled with wonky layouts, misplaced staircases and maze-like hallways as different owners make changes over the years. Mike employs his construction know-how to create a functional flow, while Denese will capture the clients style with custom finishes. By blending elements of the older homes charm with modern design, the couple will produce stunning and cohesive spaces. Throughtout the episodes, Mike and Denese will overcome choppy rooms and wasted square footage for clients and work with their dads -- master carpenters John Butler and Peter Doyle -- to deliver one-of-a-kind projects for each family.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt: Renovation
programme.desc: Families who achieved their dreams of buying an affordable vacation home are now tasked with the tough job of turning it into the relaxing oasis they envisioned when they purchased it. In each episode of Beachfront Bargain Hunt: Renovation , watch as they work together to transform their new properties into a home away from home, proving that with a little imagination and a lot of muscle, you can have the relaxing getaway youve always wanted.

programme.title: Island Life
programme.desc: Most people only fantasize about living on an island, but well prove that an Island Life is possible for anyone. Tropical dreamers will be shown island properties that fit into any budget, from ultra-affordable to totally outrageous. Well follow everyday families is search of their own slice of paradise, and prove that fantasy can be reality.

programme.title: Bahamas Life
programme.desc: The idyllic Bahamas are the perfect getaway for travellers and vacationers alike, but for some, once you visit the paradisaical islands, its hard to forget their beauty. These enamored individuals drop their city lives for these stunning Caribbean shores, leaving their livelihoods, stresses and struggles behind. In each episode of Bahamas Life, we detail the processes involved, the choice of islands and the remarkable real estate opportunities for prospective buyers looking to fulfill their dreams.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: Recent lottery winners look for their perfect dream house in this "House Hunters"-inspired reality show. David Bromstad takes recent lottery winners on over-the-top house hunts for their new dream homes. Whether they win hundreds of thousands or hundreds of millions, lucky lottery winners everywhere are jumping headfirst into the real estate market. Will they spend all their winnings on an extravagant mansion or settle for a humble sound investment? Find out what happens when average Americans set out to find "My Lottery Dream Home".

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Tarek is a self-proclaimed real estate genius with determination and drive. Christina is Tareks picture-perfect wife, who Tareks friends still cant believe he landed. In each episode of "Flip or Flop", Tarek and Christina flip a new property. From the nail-biting purchase at auction, to the frustrating renovations and maddening showings, to the giddy acceptance of an offer, well follow along as these two relatively novice flippers try their hand at the toughest game in town. From purchase to resale, weaving their personal lives within the story of the flip. From paying cash, sight unseen, for a property at auction, through the hapless remodeling process, to the frantic sale, this young couple is putting everything they have into this venture.

programme.title: Unsellable Houses
programme.desc: Real estate consultants and twin sisters Leslie Davis and Lyndsay Lamb have a knack for helping desperate homeowners sell their lifeless homes. programme.title: Unsellable Houses
programme.desc: Real estate consultants and twin sisters Leslie Davis and Lyndsay Lamb have a knack for helping desperate homeowners sell their lifeless homes. programme.title: Bargain Block
programme.desc: Bargain Block follows home renovation experts and partners Keith Bynum and Evan Thomas on their journey to restore Detroits iconic American neighborhoods one house at a time. With sound advice and support from their friend—lifetime Detroit resident and real estate expert Shea Hicks-Whitfield, who is expecting her first child—Keith and Evan buy multiple rundown and abandoned houses on a single block, take them down to the studs, and create affordable, stylish and fully furnished starter homes that are ideal for first-time homebuyers. Now settled in the Motor City, the couple, who have renovated and purchased their own home and opened a new retail store and workshop, infuse every property with a functional layout, artful design and beautiful repurposed furniture. The end result is incredible transformations of dilapidated homes that are an inspiration to the entire neighborhood.

Whether they win hundreds of thousands or hundreds of millions, lucky lottery winners everywhere are jumping headfirst into the real estate market. Will they spend all their winnings on an extravagant mansion or settle for a humble sound investment? Find out what happens when average Americans set out to find "My Lottery Dream Home".

programme.title: Help! I Wrecked My House
programme.desc: American home improvement series. Presenter Jasmine Roth visits the homes of DIY catastrophes to restore them back to a liveable space. Jasmine brings in the professionals to rescue these renovations-gone-wrong and helps homeowners realise their propertys full potential. With half-demolished houses, unfinished floors and plumbing nightmares: these refurbishment mishaps are on a monumental scale. Luckily, with expertise, hard work and vision, Jasmine and her team can hopefully transform these DIY disasters into something beautiful that their owners will love.

programme.title: Sin City Rehab
programme.desc: Alison Victoria returns where her design career started to the bright lights and high stakes of Las Vegas! Shes betting on lofty rewards, taking on multi-million-dollar projects and risky flips as she looks to expand her successful design business.

programme.title: Flipping 101 with Tarek El Moussa
programme.desc: Getting into property flipping can be daunting for first-timers, which is why Tarek El Moussa is on hand to share invaluable advice that will put them on course for handsome profits. With years in the industry, Tarek has seen and done it all. Now he wants to draw on some of his own experiences to ensure novice flippers dont make costly mistakes. Aided by Tareks knowledge and a few of his clients, surely nothing can go wrong? Reality series.

programme.title: Maine Cabin Masters
programme.desc: Join the family renovating a vacation home in Italys countryside over winter, following Chase, Sarah, their four kids, and dog across six episodes chronicling the projects progress from start to completion.

programme.title: Fix My Frankenhouse
programme.desc: Boston-based home renovation experts and husband-wife team Mike and Denese Butler fix what they refer to as "Frankenstein" houses. These are older homes that have become filled with wonky layouts, misplaced staircases and maze-like hallways as different owners make changes over the years. Mike employs his construction know-how to create a functional flow, while Denese will capture the clients style with custom finishes. By blending elements of the older homes charm with modern design, the couple will produce stunning and cohesive spaces. Throughtout the episodes, Mike and Denese will overcome choppy rooms and wasted square footage for clients and work with their dads -- master carpenters John Butler and Peter Doyle -- to deliver one-of-a-kind projects for each family.

programme.title: Island Life
programme.desc: Most people only fantasize about living on an island, but well prove that an Island Life is possible for anyone. Tropical dreamers will be shown island properties that fit into any budget, from ultra-affordable to totally outrageous. Well follow everyday families is search of their own slice of paradise, and prove that fantasy can be reality.

programme.desc: A military couple with two large dogs is tired of being crammed into a one bedroom, one bath apartment on Whidbey Island, WA. The newlyweds are looking for a house close to the naval base with a large yard for their pups.

programme.title: Bahamas Life
programme.desc: The idyllic Bahamas are the perfect getaway for travellers and vacationers alike, but for some, once you visit the paradisaical islands, its hard to forget their beauty. These enamored individuals drop their city lives for these stunning Caribbean shores, leaving their livelihoods, stresses and struggles behind. In each episode of Bahamas Life, we detail the processes involved, the choice of islands and the remarkable real estate opportunities for prospective buyers looking to fulfill their dreams.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Tarek is a self-proclaimed real estate genius with determination and drive. Christina is Tareks picture-perfect wife, who Tareks friends still cant believe he landed. In each episode of "Flip or Flop", Tarek and Christina flip a new property. From the nail-biting purchase at auction, to the frustrating renovations and maddening showings, to the giddy acceptance of an offer, well follow along as these two relatively novice flippers try their hand at the toughest game in town. From purchase to resale, weaving their personal lives within the story of the flip. From paying cash, sight unseen, for a property at auction, through the hapless remodeling process, to the frantic sale, this young couple is putting everything they have into this venture.

programme.title: Renovation
programme.desc: Renovation 911 follows emergency restoration experts and sisters, Kirsten Meehan and Lindsey Uselding, as they rescue homes in Minneapolis that have recently experienced unexpected and tragic property disasters.

programme.title: Renovation

programme.title: 100 Day Dream Home
programme.desc: Brian and Mika Kleinschmidt are a formidable husband and wife team. The married couple utilise Brians developing background and Mikas real estate experience to help clients design and build their perfect home in just 100 days. Based in Tampa, Florida, the formidable pair help local residents realise their dreams, and do all they can to ensure their ideal project is completed within the given time frame. Of course, each project comes with new difficulties to overcome, but the proof is in the pudding, and for Brian and Mika, the sweetness of watching families walk into their brand new home is the perfect reward for all their hard work. Reality series.

programme.title: Bargain Mansions
programme.desc: Based in Kansas City, Tamara Day is a restoration expert who believes no home is too big for her to take on. Scouring the city for large, neglected mansions that she can buy on the cheap, she then uses her eye for design to transform these shabby houses into elegant homes. With her dad helping her on each project, they gut the decaying aspects of each house whilst keeping any characteristic and authentic features, enticing deep-pocketed buyers with open concepts and modern layouts. Using her experience from maintaining buildings on the family farm, she turns these decrepit structures into warm homes that are perfect for a family to move in and start creating memories.

programme.title: Vacation House for Free
programme.desc: Matt Blashaw realizes couples wishes to own a vacation home mortgage free. The secret? He helps them shop for and renovate a "diamond in the rough" home in their dream location to command top dollar as a vacation rental. The end result? The couple rents out the renovated home for maximum income part of the year, covering all their annual expenses. For the rest of the year they live in a Vacation House for Free!

programme.title: Ancient Aliens: Origins
programme.desc: The Great Pyramid of Giza remains as one of the biggest mysteries of the world, with evidence suggesting it may have been an ancient power plant. Could these structures hold the key to unraveling the truth about humanitys extraterrestrial past?

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: From the producers of Ancient Aliens® and The Curse of Oak Island® From alleged UFO encounters to sudden disappearances to evil possessions, series host William Shatner attempts to get to the truth behind the most bizarre and mysterious events ever reported. With the help of the worlds top scientists, first-hand "experiencer" accounts, and dramatic reenactments, viewers gain shocking insight into whats really happening--and why.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Long before banks, ATMs and check-cashing services, there were pawn shops. Pawning was the leading form of consumer credit in the United States until the 1950s, and pawn shops are still helping everyday people make ends meet. "Pawn Stars" takes you inside the colorful world of the pawn business. At the Gold and Silver Pawn Shop on the outskirts of Las Vegas, three generations of the Harrison family — grandfather Richard, son Rick and grandson Corey — jointly run the family business, and theres clashing and camaraderie every step of the way. The three men use their sharp eyes and skills to assess the value of items from the commonplace to the truly historic, including a 16th-century samurai sword, a Super Bowl ring, a Picasso painting and a 17th-century stay of execution. Its up to them to determine whats real and whats fake, as they reveal the often surprising answer to the questions on everyones mind, "Whats the story behind it?" and "Whats it worth?"

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: For over two centuries, teams of searchers, including Franklin D. Roosevelt, have attempted to crack the code that will unearth the treasure believed to be buried on the small island off the coast of Nova Scotia. Armed with the knowledge of those that came before them, the muscle of heavy machinery and decades of engineering know-how, brothers Rick and Marty Lagina and their partners may be closer than anyone in history to finding the treasure that has so far claimed the lives of six men.

programme.title: The Secret of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Rivaling the famous Area 51 in Nevada for UFO sightings and paramormal activity, is the lesser known, but equally fascinating, Uinta Basin in Utah and, in particular, Skinwalker Ranch. For the first time, a team of scientists and experts have been granted unlimited access to the infamous and secretive 512-acre property in order to unlock the mysteries of more than 200 years of UFO activity, bizarre animal mutations and preternatural phenomena. Making good use of state-of-the-art tecnology such as drone thermography, ground-penetrating radar and lasers, the team apply their knowledge and expertise to make shocking discoveries.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens: Origins

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: From the producers of Ancient Aliens® and The Curse of Oak Island® From alleged UFO encounters to sudden disappearances to evil possessions, series host William Shatner attempts to get to the truth behind the most bizarre and mysterious events ever reported. programme.title: Pawn Stars

programme.title: The Secret of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Rivaling the famous Area 51 in Nevada for UFO sightings and paramormal activity, is the lesser known, but equally fascinating, Uinta Basin in Utah and, in particular, Skinwalker Ranch. For the first time, a team of scientists and experts have been granted unlimited access to the infamous and secretive 512-acre property in order to unlock the mysteries of more than 200 years of UFO activity, bizarre animal mutations and preternatural phenomena. Making good use of state-of-the-art tecnology such as drone thermography, ground-penetrating radar and lasers, the team apply their knowledge and expertise to make shocking discoveries.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: For over two centuries, teams of searchers, including Franklin D. Roosevelt, have attempted to crack the code that will unearth the treasure believed to be buried on the small island off the coast of Nova Scotia. Armed with the knowledge of those that came before them, the muscle of heavy machinery and decades of engineering know-how, brothers Rick and Marty Lagina and their partners may be closer than anyone in history to finding the treasure that has so far claimed the lives of six men.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: From the producers of Ancient Aliens® and The Curse of Oak Island® From alleged UFO encounters to sudden disappearances to evil possessions, series host William Shatner attempts to get to the truth behind the most bizarre and mysterious events ever reported. programme.title: Ancient Aliens: Origins
programme.desc: The Great Pyramid of Giza remains as one of the biggest mysteries of the world, with evidence suggesting it may have been an ancient power plant. Could these structures hold the key to unraveling the truth about humanitys extraterrestrial past?

programme.title: Mountain Men
programme.desc: There are men in America who must still make their living off the land; hunting and trapping to provide for their families. They are MOUNTAIN MEN. Their very survival is predicated on utilizing ancient skills perfected over hundreds of years. This series features a variety of men from Appalachia to the Rocky Mountains to Alaska and follows them as they race against winter to obtain the sustenance and money needed to make it through the coldest months of the year. Eustace Conway lives deep in the mountains of North Carolina on the "Turtle Bay Reserve." He moved here two decades ago in search of a more "truthful" existence. In the years since, hes built a home, and survived by hunting, fishing and raising animals. Tom Orr lives with his wife on the Yaak River in Montana. He is 100 miles from the nearest town, a place he hasnt ventured to in 10 years. John is a trapper by trade and to prepare for winter, he must earn enough money to obtain the supplies he needs. Marty Meierotto, his wife Dominique and their daughter Noah live in the small Alaskan town of Two Rivers. Every month, Marty pilots his bi-plane, traveling into the bush in search of the wolverine and lynx pelts he needs to make a living. While hes on the Black River, he must hunt moose and caribou to survive in the wilderness. Together, they represent Americas true MOUNTAIN MEN.

programme.title: Great Escapes with Morgan Freeman
programme.desc: Famous jailbreaks are the stuff of legend as their true stories are often untold. programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: In Storage Wars show a team of professional buyers will prove that for a good buy you need more than certain sum of money. When rent is not paid on a storage locker for a certain period, the contents can be sold as a single lot of items in the form of an auction. The best experts are fighting for containers contents, hundreds of thousands of dollars are sometimes in the game. Every participant has only some minutes to inspect the contents, and that only without entering the storage room, just looking inside. Each purchase can become a win or a loss, and nobody knows exactly whether they are buying real treasures or garbage.

programme.desc: For over two centuries, teams of searchers, including Franklin D. Roosevelt, have attempted to crack the code that will unearth the treasure believed to be buried on the small island off the coast of Nova Scotia. Armed with the knowledge of those that came before them, the muscle of heavy machinery and decades of engineering know-how, brothers Rick and Marty Lagina and their partners may be closer than anyone in history to finding the treasure that has so far claimed the lives of six men.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: From the producers of Ancient Aliens® and The Curse of Oak Island® From alleged UFO encounters to sudden disappearances to evil possessions, series host William Shatner attempts to get to the truth behind the most bizarre and mysterious events ever reported. With the help of the worlds top scientists, first-hand "experiencer" accounts, and dramatic reenactments, viewers gain shocking insight into whats really happening--and why.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Long before banks, ATMs and check-cashing services, there were pawn shops. Pawning was the leading form of consumer credit in the United States until the 1950s, and pawn shops are still helping everyday people make ends meet. "Pawn Stars" takes you inside the colorful world of the pawn business. At the Gold and Silver Pawn Shop on the outskirts of Las Vegas, three generations of the Harrison family — grandfather Richard, son Rick and grandson Corey — jointly run the family business, and theres clashing and camaraderie every step of the way. The three men use their sharp eyes and skills to assess the value of items from the commonplace to the truly historic, including a 16th-century samurai sword, a Super Bowl ring, a Picasso painting and a 17th-century stay of execution. Its up to them to determine whats real and whats fake, as they reveal the often surprising answer to the questions on everyones mind, "Whats the story behind it?" and "Whats it worth?"

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Long before banks, ATMs and check-cashing services, there were pawn shops. Its up to them to determine whats real and whats fake, as they reveal the often surprising answer to the questions on everyones mind, "Whats the story behind it?" and "Whats it worth?"

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There
programme.desc: Join host Tony Harris as he investigates the most mysterious content ever captured and attempts to unearth the truth. Employing the assistance of experts and state-of-the-art technology, Tony is determined to decipher whether these photos, videos and audio recordings of purported supernatural and paranormal events are falsified or for real. He meets with eyewitnesses, conducts tests and stops at nothing to determine the truth.

programme.title: Warriors
programme.desc: Former Green Berry Terry Schappert explores the stories of some of the most iconic warrior groups in history, including their weaponry, training, fighting tactics and more. The veteran investigates what made these legendary fighters great, but also what were their weaknesses. Join him as he looks into the battling masteries of the Vikings, the Samurai, the Spartans and more.

programme.title: UFO Hunters
programme.desc: The teams access to UFO evidence is unparalleled and their expertise allows them to quickly identify bogus claims of UFOs. Together, they use eyewitness accounts, scientific experimentation, documents recently released through the Freedom of Information Act and footage that has never been seen before on television to piece together compelling — and at times chilling — evidence of UFO phenomena. Join UFO Hunters Bill Birnes, Pat Uskert, Dr. Ted Acworth, and Jeff Tomlinson as they separate fact from fallacy.

programme.title: Engineering Disasters
programme.desc: Engineering has built our modern world. Everything from skyscrapers to roads and air travel exist because of advances in engineering. What happens when engineering goes horribly wrong? Engineering Disasters goes beyond the headlines to uncover what really happened in the most notorious engineering accidents. What caused an outdoor stage to collapse in Indiana, killing seven? How did a collection of classic Corvettes disappear right out of thin air? Why did a planes fuselage rip open in mid-flight? What was behind the collapse of a domed stadium? Each hour long episode combines expert and eyewitness interviews, state of the art graphics and dramatic moment of disaster footage to tell the story behind the worlds most terrifying engineering disasters.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: From the producers of Ancient Aliens® and The Curse of Oak Island® From alleged UFO encounters to sudden disappearances to evil possessions, series host William Shatner attempts to get to the truth behind the most bizarre and mysterious events ever reported. With the help of the worlds top scientists, first-hand "experiencer" accounts, and dramatic reenactments, viewers gain shocking insight into whats really happening--and why.

programme.title: Hunting Hitler
programme.desc: According to documents that were declassified by the FBI in 2014, Adolf Hitler may have survived World War II and fled to South America following the fall of Nazi Germany. In this series a team of investigators -- led by 21-year CIA veteran Bob Baer and war crimes investigator John Cencich -- undertakes a definitive search with the goal of finding out whether the notorious dictator actually survived the war and pulled off one of historys greatest disappearing acts. The team uncovers a mysterious Nazi lair in the Argentinean jungle and searches for evidence of a missing U-boat that may have transported Hitler out of Europe as Germany collapsed.

programme.title: Brad Meltzers Decoded
programme.desc: What if the history you knew was only half the story? Brad Meltzers Decoded investigates the other half: the secret history of the symbols and codes that surround us everyday. Best-selling author Brad Meltzer has been writing novels for more than a decade. He has studied and written about some of the most revered institutions and documents in human history, including the U.S. Supreme Court, the Presidency, the Secret Service, Wall Street and the Bible. Brad has assembled a team to investigate the countless clues and theories uncovered through his years of research, but unexplored until now. From the dollar bill to the first Presidential Codes, the hidden messages of the Statue of Liberty and the ciphers protecting the location of lost Confederate gold, the team uncovers the truth behind historys most provocative secrets.

programme.title: Evolve
programme.desc: Documentary series. Evolve takes an in-depth look at the evolution of some of the planets most iconic animals. Using computer generated imagery and experimental science, the team take you on a journey through history to look at how these species evolved to fit their habitats and surroundings. The show explores the diverse and unique anatomy changes our planets historic species have gone through. Whether its the deadly teeth of Tyrannosaurus Rex, the telescopic eyesight of lightning-fast birds, or the night vision big cats use to hunt, Evolve reveals some of natures most interesting secrets. Nominated in 2009s News and Documentary Emmy Award for Outstanding Science And Technology Programming.

programme.title: Where Did It Come From?
programme.desc: Documentary series exploring the history of Earths greatest man-made structures and creations. Where Did It Come From? reveals the earliest examples of brilliance and ingenuity from past pioneers. From the Roman highway project; a civil engineering feat establishing a network of unprecedented highways, to Egypts iconic structures, this series reveals the incomprehensible ides brought to life by magnificent minds, and in some cases, brutal slavery. Join host Michael Guillen as he dives into this fascinating world of both civil and social engineering, born out of ideas we still use today.

programme.title: Warriors
programme.desc: Former Green Berry Terry Schappert explores the stories of some of the most iconic warrior groups in history, including their weaponry, training, fighting tactics and more. Join him as he looks into the battling masteries of the Vikings, the Samurai, the Spartans and more.

programme.title: UFO Hunters
programme.desc: The teams access to UFO evidence is unparalleled and their expertise allows them to quickly identify bogus claims of UFOs. Together, they use eyewitness accounts, scientific experimentation, documents recently released through the Freedom of Information Act and footage that has never been seen before on television to piece together compelling — and at times chilling — evidence of UFO phenomena. Join UFO Hunters Bill Birnes, Pat Uskert, Dr. Ted Acworth, and Jeff Tomlinson as they separate fact from fallacy.

programme.title: Search for the Lost Giants
programme.desc: Stonemasons Jim and Bill Vieira are on a quest to investigate an incredible theory: that the myths and legends weve all been told about giants are actually rooted in fact. Jim has researched over 1,000 accounts of skeletons seven feet tall or over unearthed across America in the 19th and 20th centuries. SEARCH FOR THE LOST GIANTS will follow the Vieira brothers on their quest to find evidence of these missing bones, which seem to have slipped through the hands of history. Theyll dig for secret chambers, explore underground tunnels and dive into the deepest museum storage vaults–all to find that one bone, that one hair, that single strand of giant DNA that will answer the question: did giants walk the Earth?

programme.title: MonsterQuest
programme.desc: Most compelling evidence for the creature known as Bigfoot may be the increasing close encounters that are frightening witnesses in America. Stories have told of interactions range from objects being thrown to frightening abductions by hairy beasts.

programme.title: MonsterQuest
programme.desc: Beneath the waters of north western Canada a fifty foot monster is said to lurk. Stories from Canadas Lake Okanagan date back to the First Nation peoples, who lived in fear of this terrifying creature of the lake that became known as Ogopogo.

programme.title: Missing in Alaska
programme.desc: A jogger vanishes from the top of Mt Marathon in Alaska and a witness describes seeing a monstrous, airplane-sized raptor around the time of the disappearance. Could ancient stories of the Thunderbird be true?

programme.title: Rome: Rise and Fall of an Empire
programme.desc: A thirteen hour series which focuses on the Germanic, Britannic and other barbarian tribal wars with Rome which ultimately led to the decline and fall of the Roman Empire. This series is centered on the campaigns and battles with the barbarian tribes and extensive examinations of the reigns of little known Roman emperors and generals. The significance and structures of key barbarian tribes and the roles their leaders played are explored in detail. Territorial changes to the Roman Empire caused by unrelenting wars, plagues, mass starvations and power struggles are presented in chronological historical context with extensive re-enactments. This series examines how the continuous wars with the barbarians and depletion of resources became a core cause of the Roman Empires decline and eventual collapse.

programme.title: Clash of the Gods
programme.desc: Documentary series that in each episode explains the heroic and tragic life of various figures from Greek and Norse mythologies - the most powerful monsters, heroes and Gods, including Thor, Hercules, Beowulf, Minotaur, Odysseus and Zeus. Was ancient Greeces greatest hero Hercules a real person? What inspired the Minotaurs labyrinth? Did Odysseuss famous journey really happen? This series will answer these and many other questions, and experts will connect the myths we all know to actual historical events, and link the stories to mythologies of other cultures as well.

programme.title: Doomsday: 10 Ways the World Will End
programme.desc: Theories of how the world will meet its end in this doomsday documentary as we follow scientist Trevor S. Valle as he hypothesises with others through the series. Looking into how the human race will be wiped out with each episode examining a different theory of how the planet will be destroyed. From being swallowed by a black hole, bombed by meteorites or overcome by aliens the series covers the most popular theories. An intriguing and interesting watch that will have you questioning how things out of this world could see the end of the earth.

programme.title: Countdown To Apocalypse
programme.desc: Utah housewife Peggy Layton has stored years worth of food in an underground shelter and zombie researcher Matt Mogk has developed his own survival plan including a stockpile of weapons specifically chosen to fend off a zombie attack.

programme.title: River Hunters
programme.desc: In River Hunters, Rick Edwards and river-searching expert Beau Ouimette visit some of the most historically significant sites across Britain: covering iconic events and battles including Roman Briton, the Wars of the Roses, the Reformation and the English Civil War. Their searches of these unexplored rivers and waterways unearth treasures from the past which reveal how our various ancestors used to live. As the artefacts surface from under layers of silt and rocks, the duo will meet with local archaeologists and historians to unearth the stories and people behind the finds. Spanning each rivers layered past, the new series will offer a fresh perspective and even redefine our history as we know it. Using state-of-the-art technology, archive maps and contemporaneous accounts from the period, Beau and Rick perform the first underwater archeological digs in some of the most exciting and iconic historical sites in Britain, often in dangerous and fast-flowing water.

From being swallowed by a black hole, bombed by meteorites or overcome by aliens the series covers the most popular theories. An intriguing and interesting watch that will have you questioning how things out of this world could see the end of the earth.

programme.title: River Hunters
programme.desc: In River Hunters, Rick Edwards and river-searching expert Beau Ouimette visit some of the most historically significant sites across Britain: covering iconic events and battles including Roman Briton, the Wars of the Roses, the Reformation and the English Civil War. Their searches of these unexplored rivers and waterways unearth treasures from the past which reveal how our various ancestors used to live. As the artefacts surface from under layers of silt and rocks, the duo will meet with local archaeologists and historians to unearth the stories and people behind the finds. Spanning each rivers layered past, the new series will offer a fresh perspective and even redefine our history as we know it. Using state-of-the-art technology, archive maps and contemporaneous accounts from the period, Beau and Rick perform the first underwater archeological digs in some of the most exciting and iconic historical sites in Britain, often in dangerous and fast-flowing water.

programme.title: Lost Worlds
programme.desc: Documentary series that brings back to life lost cities, structures, cultures, and civilisations, transporting viewers back in time and revealing the truth behind some of historys most iconic eras. Using a combination of cutting-edge technology and archaeological research, the team detail what life was like for these places during their peak of their powers, and use visual overlays to compare past and present landscapes. From the Knights Templar to the lost city of Atlantis, ancient Egypt to Hitlers planned supercity, and ancient Athens to Americas wild west, each episodes dives into these extraordinary remnants of human history.

programme.title: Unidentified: Inside Americas UFO Investigation
programme.desc: In December of 2017, The New York Times published a stunning front-page expose about the Pentagons mysterious UFO program, the Advanced Aerospace Threat Identification Program (AATIP). Featuring an interview with a former military intelligence official and Special Agent In-Charge, Luis Elizondo, who confirmed the existence of the hidden government program, the controversial story was the focus of worldwide attention. Previously run by Elizondo, AATIP was created to research and investigate Unidentified Aerial Phenomena (UAP) including numerous videos of reported encounters, three of which were released to a shocked public in 2017. Elizondo resigned after expressing to the government that these UAPs could pose a major threat to our national security and not enough was being done to deal with them or address our potential vulnerabilities. Now, as a part of HISTORYs groundbreaking new six-part, one-hour limited series UNIDENTIFIED: INSIDE AMERICAS UFO INVESTIGATION, Elizondo is speaking out for the first time with Tom DeLonge, co-founder and President of To The Stars Academy of Arts and Science and Chris Mellon, former Deputy Assistant Secretary of Defense and Intelligence, to expose a series of startling encounters and embark on fascinating new investigations that will urge the public to ask questions and look for answers. The series will reveal newly authenticated evidence and footage, interviews from eyewitnesses and former military personnel who have never spoken out before, and extensive breakthroughs in understanding the technology behind these unknown phenomena in our skies.

programme.desc: A true crime series that takes a unique view at an often overlooked part of criminal investigations - the confession. Covering crimes from home invasions to murder, this show examines all aspects of crime and highlights the skillful tactics used by law enforcement interrogation experts. Splicing dramatic simulations with actual police footage, each epsiode focuses on a different case and we are exposed to the often chilling verbatim accounts of the perpetrators as they are interviewed by the investigating officers. One such case involves two apparent strangers who are found dead in two separate states but who display the same MO. The detectives, from different jurisdictions, have to uncover the link between the two men, why they were killed and who the murderer is.

programme.title: Evil Talks: Chilling Confessions

The detectives, from different jurisdictions, have to uncover the link between the two men, why they were killed and who the murderer is.

programme.title: Gone
programme.desc: True crime series exploring the unexpected disappearances of people in the USA and the difficulty the police have with solving the mysteries. After members of the community vanish without a trace, law enforcement officials are tasked with tracking them down before they become a victim. These detectives, along with determined loved ones, spend years agonizing over minute details that could help them understand what led to the disappearance of seemingly untroubled people. With some cases taking decades to solve, Gone looks at the impact this has on friends and family members seeking closure.

programme.title: Gone

With some cases taking decades to solve, Gone looks at the impact this has on friends and family members seeking closure.

programme.title: The Perfect Murder
programme.desc: This team of detectives are determined to detain the dangerous killers that they are faced with. What may initially seem like the "perfect murder" requires a great depth of investigation and dedication, but eventually the detectives crack them open and reveal the truth. The key to their success is their great level of persistence, and imaginative investigative skills. Dead ends wont deter the team, when a seemingly impossible case lands on their desks, they always find a way in the end.

programme.title: The Perfect Murder
programme.desc: This team of detectives are determined to detain the dangerous killers that they are faced with. What may initially seem like the "perfect murder" requires a great depth of investigation and dedication, but eventually the detectives crack them open and reveal the truth. The key to their success is their great level of persistence, and imaginative investigative skills. Dead ends wont deter the team, when a seemingly impossible case lands on their desks, they always find a way in the end.

programme.title: Murder In the Heartland
programme.desc: This series focuses on the dark underbelly of the American mid-west, its heartland. Each episode deals with a specific murder thats been commited in one of the small towns that make up this iconic region of the US with the locals enhancing the tales and bringing clues to our attention. The show includes interviews with the victims family, friends, law enforcement officers and also provides dramatic reenactments to bring the stories to life. Episodes reveal true stories such as when an Oklahoma familys dog drops a human skull onto their porch and the police are called in to investigate; a bride-to-be who discovers her betrothed shot in the head in their living room; a beloved father, son and fiancee who is discovered beaten to death in his own driveway; and a devoted family man who diappears after his truck is set on fire.

programme.title: Murder In the Heartland

programme.title: Before They Kill Again
programme.desc: A detective discovers that he knows a kidnapper personally and that getting the victim back alive now hinges on his relationship with a maniac.

programme.title: A Body in the Basement
programme.desc: These chilling stories of murder hit terrifyingly close to home -- each a real-life tale about the last thing anyone wants to find in their basement, a dead body. Every episode will make one think twice before ever stepping foot in the basement again.

programme.title: Who Killed Jane Doe?
programme.desc: A true-crime documentary series examining murders of women and the two aspects of each case; the detectives pursuing the killer and the family struggling to come to terms with their loss. With dramatised reconstructions to portray the events as they happened, each episode focusses on a different, chilling murder, listening to both the professional and personal side of a murder investigation. Whilst detectives scour crime scenes for evidence and clues to identify a victim, a family is waiting in vain for the impending announcement, aware of who the victim could very well be. A unique murder documentary series that offers a reminder of the delicate and poignant side to each investigation.

programme.title: Who Killed Jane Doe?
programme.desc: A true-crime documentary series examining murders of women and the two aspects of each case; the detectives pursuing the killer and the family struggling to come to terms with their loss. With dramatised reconstructions to portray the events as they happened, each episode focusses on a different, chilling murder, listening to both the professional and personal side of a murder investigation. Whilst detectives scour crime scenes for evidence and clues to identify a victim, a family is waiting in vain for the impending announcement, aware of who the victim could very well be. A unique murder documentary series that offers a reminder of the delicate and poignant side to each investigation.

programme.title: Murder By Numbers
programme.desc: Murder by Numbers is a true-crime documentary series exploring disturbing cases of deranged killers across the USA. Using extensive reenactments, the brutal crimes are brought to life, to show viewers the appearance of crime scenes and the issues faced by detectives. After bodies are found, vigorous investigations begin, with law enforcement officials scrambling to unearth evidence and identify the culprit. What they find leaves more than a sour taste, as distressing discoveries of a second corpse leaves officials stunned and disturbed. Now the investigation takes a far more sinister and eerie turn.

programme.title: People Magazine Investigates
programme.desc: Investigation Discovery and People magazine partner to re-examine some of the most high profile crime cases in recent history. The one-hour series brings viewers tales of betrayal, buried secrets and unsung heroes, ripped from the pages of one of the nations top weekly magazines. These stories transcended news and became part of pop culture, revealing shocking twists, new evidence, and unexpected resolutions. Interlaced within every episode are exclusive interviews with Peoples journalists, archival footage, re-creations, and firsthand accounts by those closest to the investigations.

programme.title: The Louvre Heist Minute By Minute
programme.desc: A gripping reconstruction of the daring robbery that happened in broad daylight at the Louvre Museum in Paris in October 2025.

programme.title: Signs Of A Psychopath
programme.desc: Series about the most notorious killers in modern history. An analysis of news images and statements made by the killers themselves shows how they worked. Explore the evil signs that every psychopath has got and follow the real archive footage.

programme.title: Inside the Heist
programme.desc: A South London gang plans to make history by stealing a priceless diamond on display at the Millennium Dome in a daring daylight robbery.

programme.title: Mother, May I Murder?
programme.desc: Shooters target 32-year-old James in bed, and police follow a dark trail of twisted family secrets, teen suspects, and an evil, manipulative mother.

programme.title: Mother, May I Murder?
programme.desc: After a young professors murder in his bed, police unravel an incredible plot with six twisted attempts on his life by those he holds dearest.

programme.title: Who Killed Jane Doe?
programme.desc: A true-crime documentary series examining murders of women and the two aspects of each case; the detectives pursuing the killer and the family struggling to come to terms with their loss. With dramatised reconstructions to portray the events as they happened, each episode focusses on a different, chilling murder, listening to both the professional and personal side of a murder investigation. Whilst detectives scour crime scenes for evidence and clues to identify a victim, a family is waiting in vain for the impending announcement, aware of who the victim could very well be. A unique murder documentary series that offers a reminder of the delicate and poignant side to each investigation.

programme.title: Королева змей
programme.desc: 14-летнюю Екатерину Медичи выдают замуж за будущего короля Генриха II. Вскоре девушка узнает, что её муж влюблён в другую женщину, а сама она не может забеременеть и оставить ему наследников.

programme.title: Возраст несогласия
programme.desc: Накануне президентских выборов 2018 года вышел сериал Андрея Лошака "Возраст несогласия" — о молодых сторонниках Алексея Навального, принимавших участие в его предвыборной кампании. В сиквеле сериала, снятого в преддверии очередных "выборов", рассказывается, как за 6 лет драматически изменилась жизнь активистов, мечтавших вместе с Навальным о прекрасной России будущего. Съемки были почти завершены, когда стало известно о смерти политика. Герои фильма задаются вопросом: как жить без мечты и надежды?

programme.title: Ловушка
programme.desc: Главе самого мощного городского мафиозного клана удалось прекратить криминальные войны. Казалось бы, он наконец-то может уйти на покой, передав дела своим молодым и дерзким помощникам. Но те слишком рьяно берутся за дело: быстро удваивают доходы, но своими жесткими методами вызывают волну всеобщего недовольства. Мечта крестного отца о тихой жизни никак не осуществится - ему постоянно приходится вмешиваться, чтобы сохранить мир. Однако о мире приходится забыть, когда после 12-ти лет тюрьмы в город возвращается крупный криминальный авторитет, готовый любой ценой вернуть утраченные позиции.

programme.title: Детали
programme.desc: Люди, которые одинаково пахнут, с большей вероятностью станут друзьями. Прививка от рака гортани. Робот-помощник использует искусственный интеллект для общения с пожилыми. Роботы, похожие на насекомых, способны пролезть в самые труднодоступные места.

programme.title: Детали
programme.desc: Ученые Университета Дюка разработали индекс биологического старения организма. Роботы обычно с трудом могут налить стакан воды: почему? Затопление фермерских полей помогает целым популяциям птиц. Ученые-любители приносят пользу крупным научным проектам.

programme.title: Детали
programme.desc: Ветряные установки будут использовать в судоходстве. В Стэнфорде разработали роботизированную руку со способностями геккона. Как в домашних условиях сделать топливо из пищевых отходов. Как гены неандертальцев влияют на восприятие лекарств людьми сегодня.

programme.title: С.С.С.Р.
programme.desc: Весна 1981 года. Олимпиада позади, но еще не стерлась со стен олимпийская символика. Спокойное, мирное, сонное время – брежневский застой. Четверо друзей возвращаются из армии, вместе они прошли огонь и воду, нештатные ситуации, спасали друг другу жизнь. В шутку они называют себя "СССР" по первым буквам имен – Сергей, Семен, Самвел и Рома. История дружбы и взросления развивается на фоне стремительно меняющейся страны, но у их "СССР", в отличие от Советского Союза, есть надежда. Союз друзей сохранится, хотя за десять лет не раз будет испытан на прочность.

programme.title: С.С.С.Р.
programme.desc: Весна 1981 года. Олимпиада позади, но еще не стерлась со стен олимпийская символика. Спокойное, мирное, сонное время – брежневский застой. Четверо друзей возвращаются из армии, вместе они прошли огонь и воду, нештатные ситуации, спасали друг другу жизнь. В шутку они называют себя "СССР" по первым буквам имен – Сергей, Семен, Самвел и Рома. История дружбы и взросления развивается на фоне стремительно меняющейся страны, но у их "СССР", в отличие от Советского Союза, есть надежда. Союз друзей сохранится, хотя за десять лет не раз будет испытан на прочность.

programme.title: 5 минут тишины. Новые горизонты
programme.desc: Парень и девушка тайком пробираются на территорию завода, чтобы прыгнуть с высокой трубы. Ржавая лестница под ними ломается, и назад пути нет — только прыгать. Девушка стартует неудачно, ударяется о трубу и повисает без сознания. А парень, который собрался прыгать впервые, остается на верхушке трубы, совершенно беспомощный. Тем временем, в трамвайном депо рабочий не успевает вытащить руку из-под вагона, и ее придавливает. Он рискует погибнуть от потери крови, а домкрат неисправен…

programme.title: 5 минут тишины. Новые горизонты
programme.desc: Спасатели отряда 42-21 получают временное назначение в Ульяновск. Свадьба Лины и Грека снова срывается, а Шимко с удочеренной девочкой решает переехать в Анапу. Гиреев обещает попросить перевод, чтобы воссоединиться с семьей. Но героям некогда решать личные проблемы: прямо перед отъездом им приходится спасать дайвера, который нашел клад в затопленной старой усадьбе на дне реки и застрял под упавшей плитой…

programme.title: Желание сердца
programme.desc: Говорят, что ни одно доброе дело не остается безнаказанным. Кейли Сукияйнен исполняет сердечные желания тех людей, которые всегда были рядом с другими, так или иначе поддерживали их, воодушевляли, но при этом оставляли себя на втором плане. Пришло время осуществить их сокровенные желания!

programme.title: Ремонт на сдачу
programme.desc: Кейли и Мерлин предстоит долгая дорога, ведь квартира, требующая обновления находится в зимней столице Эстонии - Отепя. Выбор квартир с посуточной арендой здесь невелик, что делает весьма интересной возможность заработать на недвижимости. Хозяйка квартиры Рагне, скромная на первый взгляд женщина, в процессе ремонта превращается в талантливого дизайнера, очень внимательного к деталям.

programme.title: Анатомия убийства
programme.desc: В воздуховоде кафе находят мумифицированное тело женщины. Евгения вместе со студентами исследует останки. Им удается определить личность жертвы, ее возраст, время и способ убийства. Это выпускница балетного училища Любовь Сычева, пропавшая без вести много лет назад. Евгения пытается восстановить события прошлого, которые привели к необычному и жестокому убийству. А тем временем в ее собственной жизни тоже происходят странные и пугающие события.

programme.title: Анатомия убийства
programme.desc: В воздуховоде кафе находят мумифицированное тело женщины. Евгения вместе со студентами исследует останки. Им удается определить личность жертвы, ее возраст, время и способ убийства. Это выпускница балетного училища Любовь Сычева, пропавшая без вести много лет назад. Евгения пытается восстановить события прошлого, которые привели к необычному и жестокому убийству. А тем временем в ее собственной жизни тоже происходят странные и пугающие события.

programme.title: Анатомия убийства
programme.desc: Евгения Волкова – женщина с непростой профессией и непростой судьбой. Она – патологоанатом, и у неё есть тайна, которая заставляет её бежать из родного города и устроиться простой сиделкой в богатый подмосковный дом. Вскоре выясняется причина, по которой открылась вакансия: предыдущая сиделка Раисы Самсоновой погибла при таинственных обстоятельствах. Мириться со скелетами в шкафу не в характере Евгении. Она узнаёт все неприглядные секреты этого, на первый взгляд, благонравного семейства и находит убийцу. В расследовании ей помогает сосед – красивый мужчина с ироничным взглядом, прикованный к инвалидному креслу. Как выясняет Евгения, он зарабатывает на жизнь, сочиняя женские романы под псевдонимом Наталья Душевная. Но это далеко не всё, что он скрывает…

programme.title: Анатомия убийства
programme.desc: Евгения Волкова – женщина с непростой профессией и непростой судьбой. Она – патологоанатом, и у неё есть тайна, которая заставляет её бежать из родного города и устроиться простой сиделкой в богатый подмосковный дом. Вскоре выясняется причина, по которой открылась вакансия: предыдущая сиделка Раисы Самсоновой погибла при таинственных обстоятельствах. Мириться со скелетами в шкафу не в характере Евгении. Она узнаёт все неприглядные секреты этого, на первый взгляд, благонравного семейства и находит убийцу. В расследовании ей помогает сосед – красивый мужчина с ироничным взглядом, прикованный к инвалидному креслу. Как выясняет Евгения, он зарабатывает на жизнь, сочиняя женские романы под псевдонимом Наталья Душевная. Но это далеко не всё, что он скрывает…

programme.title: Следствие вели...
programme.desc: Эти уголовные дела гремели на весь Советский Союз. По ним были написаны романы и сняты художественные фильмы. Их фигуранты — миллионеры эпохи социализма, хитроумные воры, профессиональные грабители и валютчики. Они бросили вызов советскому обществу. Вызов приняли лучшие сыщики страны. В их распоряжении не было компьютеров, сотовой связи и бойцов ОМОНа. Но это не мешало вершиться правосудию. Банда "Черная кошка", дело банды советских гангстеров конца 60-х годов, прозванных "Фантомасами", увлекательная история налетчика Леонида Пантелеева, "свободного художника-грабителя" — эти случаи вошли в историю отечественной криминалистики. Но главная цель сериала — не просто рассказать о преступлениях и злоумышленниках советского времени, а показать ушедшую эпоху так, чтобы молодые зрители смогли прочувствовать дух ушедшего времени, а зрители постарше — ностальгию по прошлому.

programme.title: Двое
programme.desc: Отчаявшись поправить здоровье путём традиционной медицины, Надя уговаривает своего мужа Андрея отправиться в поход к целебным озерам. Андрей соглашается. В этом походе, вдали от сурового тестя, он планирует сообщить Наде о разводе. Но природа вмешивается в планы героев. Из-за начавшихся дождей вода в реке поднимается, отрезая путь домой. В поисках переправы Андрей и Надя теряются в глухой сибирской тайге. С этого момента начинается их сложный путь борьбы со своими страхами и работы над ошибками прошлого. Только здесь, оказавшись на грани жизни и смерти, они по-настоящему узнают себя и друг друга.

programme.title: Музыкальная интуиция
programme.desc: Уникальное шоу, в котором 10 незнакомцев делают вид, что умеют петь, хотя на самом деле это утверждение правдиво лишь наполовину. Двум звёздным командам из комиков и музыкантов предстоит провести расследование, чтобы отличить певцов от лжецов и выиграть главный приз, который затем отправится в благотворительные фонды.

programme.title: Возраст несогласия
programme.desc: Накануне президентских выборов 2018 года вышел сериал Андрея Лошака "Возраст несогласия" — о молодых сторонниках Алексея Навального, принимавших участие в его предвыборной кампании. В сиквеле сериала, снятого в преддверии очередных "выборов", рассказывается, как за 6 лет драматически изменилась жизнь активистов, мечтавших вместе с Навальным о прекрасной России будущего. Съемки были почти завершены, когда стало известно о смерти политика. Герои фильма задаются вопросом: как жить без мечты и надежды?

programme.title: Ловушка
programme.desc: Главе самого мощного городского мафиозного клана удалось прекратить криминальные войны. Казалось бы, он наконец-то может уйти на покой, передав дела своим молодым и дерзким помощникам. Но те слишком рьяно берутся за дело: быстро удваивают доходы, но своими жесткими методами вызывают волну всеобщего недовольства. Мечта крестного отца о тихой жизни никак не осуществится - ему постоянно приходится вмешиваться, чтобы сохранить мир. Однако о мире приходится забыть, когда после 12-ти лет тюрьмы в город возвращается крупный криминальный авторитет, готовый любой ценой вернуть утраченные позиции.

programme.title: Утро
programme.desc: Утренняя новостная программа Настоящего времени.

programme.title: Ждём в гости
programme.desc: Проект Ирины Хангошвили о культуре, истории и традициях различных стран мира. Ведущий - Зураб Двали - путешествует и приглашает зрителей пройтись вместе с ним по красивым местам, увидеть достопримечательности, полюбоваться природой и познакомиться с интересными людьми. Всюду гостеприимные хозяева говорят нашим телезрителям: "Ждем в гости!" Зрители сначала узнают интересные исторические факты о самых известных или забытых регионах различных стран, и затем останавливаются на кулинарных традициях - готовят несколько блюд с гостями программы.

programme.title: Все любят Рэймонда
programme.desc: "Все любят Рэймонда" – это американская ситком-комедия, повествующая о повседневной жизни Рэймонда Барона, спортивного обозревателя, проживающего с семьёй на Лонг-Айленде. Основная изюминка сериала – остроумный характер комедии, где на первый план выходят семейные отношения: с любящей, но часто критичной женой, Деброй, детьми, а также с навязчивыми родителями и завистливым братом, которые живут через дорогу. Сериал идеально подойдёт для тех, кто хочет смотреть лёгкие и забавные истории о семейной жизни. Серию за серией, комедийные ситуации создают атмосферу доброты и юмора.

programme.title: Все любят Рэймонда
programme.desc: "Все любят Рэймонда" – это американская ситком-комедия, повествующая о повседневной жизни Рэймонда Барона, спортивного обозревателя, проживающего с семьёй на Лонг-Айленде. programme.title: Острое блюдо
programme.desc: Ирина Рублёва собирается отпраздновать свой день рождения в турецком отеле, куда ее семью пригласили друзья — супруги Люда и Борис. Но праздник оказывается испорчен: Ирина узнает, что ее муж Вадим не сможет приехать из-за важных дел… На курорте Ирина знакомится с романтичным турком Керемом, который влюбляется в нее и обещает ждать всю жизнь. Для героини это шанс вырваться из невыносимого брака, где свекровь тиранит ее, а муж — бьет. Но решится ли она на такой отчаянный шаг?
