programme.title: Witness: Disaster in Japan
programme.desc: On March 11, 2011, a 9.0 magnitude earthquake struck 75 miles off the eastern coast of Japan. Almost immediately, tsunami warnings blared, urging residents along Japans coast to quickly move to higher ground. For the next several hours, residents watched in stunned horror as a series of massive waves slammed into the coast, inundating entire towns and sweeping across the countryside, laying waste to everything in its path. Throughout, amateur videographers, news crews, government agencies, tourists, and countless others were recording the sights and sounds of the unfolding catastrophe. Weaving together their footage, Witness: Japans Disaster reconstructs the earthquake and tsunami as they happened, entirely through the eyes of those who experienced them.

programme.title: Strangest Things
programme.desc: Chess-playing computers are nothing new today, but how did a robot beat the worlds best chess players back in 1770? Is this the worlds first artificial intelligence, or is there sleight of hand at play? Charles Lindbergh was arguably the worlds most famous man in the 1930s, as the first to fly non-stop across the Atlantic and then have his son tragically kidnapped. Lesser known is his invention of a singular glass pump of elegant design. What is it for? A 2,400-year-old mummy is brought from Egypt to Croatia by a collector. Only after it is donated to a museum does anyone realize that this mummy is wrapped in the rarest remnant of a lost language. The writing on the wrappings is pored over by experts to decipher it. What does it say?

programme.title: Strangest Things
programme.desc: Towering 13 feet tall and over 11,000 years old, the Vulture Stone is a mysterious message from the end of the Ice Age, one of many relief carvings found at the site of Gobekli Tepe in Turkey. What can its strange depictions of birds, a scorpion and a headless man mean? A disturbing dome-like mask with a box where the mouth should be is the legacy of 1920s inventor and sci-fi writer Hugo Gernsback. His goal was peace and quiet on demand, but did he instead pre-empt the medical and torture applications of sensory deprivation? In a Swiss church stands a fearsome skeleton clothed in a suit of armor that is as exotic as it is impractical. Who would go to the trouble of creating such an ornately macabre work of art, and whose skeleton is it?

programme.title: Science of Stupid
programme.desc: Science of Stupid, series 8. Dallas Campbell hosts the show that combines serious science with some of the craziest, most spectacular user generated clips ever recorded. In each programme we show 40 to 50 clips of misadventure: ordinary folk making extraordinary mistakes and paying the price. We analyse the science behind the mishaps, with the help of bespoke animation and super slow-motion cinematography.

programme.title: Science of Stupid
programme.desc: Ever slipped on ice and wondered why?….Ever been perplexed by your failure to throw a Frisbee….or spent sleepless nights trying to work out why your BMX jump ended up in a hospital visit? Well help is at hand as Richard Hammond returns for a second season of "Science of Stupid." This is the show that combines cold hard science with some of the craziest, most spectacular and painful user generated clips ever recorded is back for a second season. In this episode we learn just how many ways there are to embarrass, injure and humiliate oneself when rotating on a pommel horse, running through walls and jumping whilst wearing rollerblades.

programme.title: The Tale of Sylian
programme.desc: Nikola, a farmer grappling with the harsh reality of new economic policies, is unable to sell his land or crops. When his family leaves in search of a better life abroad, he takes a job as a landfill attendant, where he encounters the injured white stork Silyan. As Nikola nurses the bird back to health, an unlikely bond forms between man and animal.

programme.title: Inside Melbourne Airport
programme.desc: Duty Manager Dan must deal with a check-in outage at the start of the busy school holidays. Airside Safety responds to a life-or-death medical emergency on an incoming flight. 68 racehorses valued at $300 million dollars arrive from Europe. Overnight, the airside lighting team carry out vital work while dodging planes.

programme.title: Inside Airport: Lost and Found
programme.desc: Airport Lost and Found workers reunite travelers with a dog who wiggled out of his leash upon arrival and wandered the airport grounds for a week, a collection of vintage tennis rackets belonging to a pro tennis player, a purse containing over a hundred dollars in cash, a backpack brimming with lifesaving prescription medicine, a childs beloved stuffed panda bear, and a full Army uniform.

programme.title: Toronto Airport Uncovered
programme.desc: Spring break brings a surge in passenger numbers and added pressures on airport staff and infrastructure: heavy bags rip a section of the baggage conveyor belt which needs fixing before the afternoon rush. A low-cost-holiday jet with millions of miles on the clock needs a new engine. Staff must race passengers from a delayed flight to their jet headed for the Caribbean, and an elite restaurant along with staff on the apron feel the heat as passenger numbers soar.

programme.title: Strangest Things
programme.desc: The mask of Tutankhamun is one of the most famous finds of ancient Egypt, but close inspection reveals a consistent set of strange marks around all the hieroglyphs spelling Tutankhamuns name. Could the name have been engraved over top of another? In North America during World War II, strange and insidious-looking devices made of wood, rope, sandbags and gunpowder were found scattered across the northwestern USA and Canada. Who made them, and what was their sinister purpose? And in East London, a decorative clay bottle from the Middle Ages is uncovered. Not so strange, until the plug was removed and the bottles contents revealed to include rusty nails, centuries-old human hair, fingernails … and urine. What is this sorcery?

programme.title: Strangest Things
programme.desc: Easter Islands tall stone moai have long captured the global imagination, and there are still mysteries surrounding them. Out of nearly 1,000, why is one particular moai, called Tukuturi, the only one kneeling and sporting a beard? In 1950s USA, sightings of UFOs were a national phenomenon. Alien or not, many Americans didnt realize that the US military was working their own flying saucer: the Avrocar. And just after Newtons discoveries about gravity, 18th-century German physician Franz Anton Mesmer also proposed an invisible force that he called ""animal magnetism." To harness it, he built a device from a giant wooden tub saying it could cure any illness. Patients seemed to corroborate the claim, but could it be true?

programme.title: Ancient X Files
programme.desc: Despite the claims of a famous work of fiction, never has a code been discovered in a painting by Leonardo Da Vinci. But new high resolution images of the Mona Lisa, taken to record its fading colours, may have revealed more than cracks in the varnish. One man believes he has found hidden numbers and letters. This episode follows the trail of a potential code…could it reveal the true meaning behind this enigmatic painting? Also in this episode, the worlds oldest underground temple and discovered with up to 7,000 skeletons.

programme.title: Ancient X Files
programme.desc: Mary Magdalene has long been known as a repentant sinner, a saint, and perhaps most importantly, the witness to the resurrection. But author Margaret Starbird believes that she was also Jesus wife, mother of his child and victim of the biggest conspiracy in history. In this television exclusive she examines what some have claimed could be one of the earliest Christian artefacts ever discovered and untangles a riddle that she believes reveals the truth about this mysterious woman from the bible.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation Special Report
programme.desc: Innocent lives are lost when civilian planes inadvertently become targets, but each incident teaches us vital lessons about how to better protect commercial airliners from the heat of war. Charred wreckage in the Sinai Desert is all thats left of a Russian passenger plane. A Korean 747 plunges into the sea and Soviet officials soon admit to shooting it down. And, when a commercial airliner is blown out of Ukrainian airspace, investigators face geo-political roadblocks at every turn.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation Special Report
programme.desc: In 1981, the Federal Aviation Administration established the sterile cockpit rule requiring pilots to refrain from non-essential activities during critical phases of flight. When this rule is broken, the resulting distraction can be deadly. Passengers fight for their lives inside a burning plane at Dallas Fort Worth Airport. A brand new L-1011 crashes in a remote swamp in the Florida Everglades. And, during a demonstration flight, a brand new Russian Superjet slams into a mountain south of Jakarta.

programme.title: X-Ray Earth
programme.desc: Beneath our feet, under trillions of tons of rock, lurk astonishing and deadly secrets. Earthquakes, tsunamis, volcanic eruptions are all driven by hidden forces deep inside our planet. Now, using the latest scientific data from sensors and surface scans, we can x-ray the earth to reveal the dangers locked inside our planet.Using thousands of sensors and state of the art surface scan information, for the first time, we can create x-rays of the deep interior of our planet.

programme.title: X-Ray Earth
programme.desc: Beneath our feet, under trillions of tons of rock, lurk astonishing and deadly secrets. Earthquakes, tsunamis, volcanic eruptions are all driven by hidden forces deep inside our planet. Now, using the latest scientific data from sensors and surface scans, we can x-ray the earth to reveal the dangers locked inside our planet.Using thousands of sensors and state of the art surface scan information, for the first time, we can create x-rays of the deep interior of our planet.

programme.title: One Strange Rock
programme.desc: For the privileged few who have looked down at the Earth from space, the thin blue line of our planets sets the Earth apart from every other planet weve seen. It sustains life. The story of how the Earth creates and regulates that oxygen rich-atmosphere is mind-blowing: A flying river, a global dust storm, a collapsing glacier and the most important creature youve never heard of. All connected together to allow life and the planet to breathe.

programme.title: One Strange Rock
programme.desc: For the privileged few who have looked down at the Earth from space, the thin blue line of our planets sets the Earth apart from every other planet weve seen. It sustains life. The story of how the Earth creates and regulates that oxygen rich-atmosphere is mind-blowing: A flying river, a global dust storm, a collapsing glacier and the most important creature youve never heard of. All connected together to allow life and the planet to breathe.

programme.title: Pole to Pole with Will Smith
programme.desc: Joined by linguist Dr. Mary Walworth and local marine ecologist John Aini, Will travels to the South Pacific on an expedition to a remote island threatened by rising seas. What begins as an exploration into an incredible marine paradise quickly transforms into a truly revelatory journey for Will about his own history as they record a lost language spoken by only five people.

programme.title: Pole to Pole with Will Smith
programme.desc: Will travels deep into the Kalahari Desert to meet the San people, one of the oldest hunter-gatherer groups on Earth. To discover the secret to their enduring success, he must join them on a hunt in one of the most inhospitable places on the planet. Led by local San bushman guide Kane Motswana, its not long before he realizes hes entirely unsuited to this adventure.

programme.title: Ice Rroad Rescue
programme.desc: Thord and Bjoern join forces when a truck threatens to tip down a hill. As it teeters on the balance, Bjoern plans to climb a ladder to secure a strap until Thord puts a stop to it. On an iced-up mountain track, Domenic and Thords daughter, Malin, head out to rescue a van but fail to reach it. Thord joins them on a rescue that makes him realise theres a fine line between life and death. In the north, Jo Roger calls in reinforcements for a triple rescue of a truck, van and drill rig.

programme.title: Ice Rroad Rescue
programme.desc: "Ice Road Rescue" portrays a group of heroic tow truck rescue workers. When winter hits Norway the transport roads turn into treacherous bobsleigh tracks. Every day the rescuers fight to keep this routes open by rescuing heavy trailers stuck in the mountain terrain. Winter storms, avalanches and lack of daylight through the winter season are just some of the challenges they have to face, working close to the polar circle. Extreme winter conditions that often make them risk their lives. "Ice Road Rescue" shows the ultimate man versus nature.

programme.title: Construction Fails
programme.desc: Glass may be the most popular construction material in the modern age. But constructing with glass is challenging and dangerous. It spontaneously breaks and falls from skyscrapers and it even crushes warehouse workers. We investigate the scientific anomaly of nickel sulfide inclusion and its effect on glass The vast majority of demolitions rely on the excavator to bring the building down. In this story we witness the perfect way to do it and contrast it with multiple examples of demolition by excavator fails. Operator error, unstable ground, unpredictable fall angles - we show it all.

programme.title: Construction Fails
programme.desc: Construction cranes are towers in the sky - except when they collapse. Our first story examines three disasters in Seattle, Manhattan and Bangkok. Three disasters: three different reasons for collapse. We examine what went wrong. The Artz Pedregal Mall in Mexico City had only been open a few months before the cantilevered section of the structure came crashing to the street below. How could a brand new building fail so dramatically? Whats so precarious about cantilever designs?

programme.title: Inside Melbourne Airport
programme.desc: Duty Manager Dan must deal with a check-in outage at the start of the busy school holidays. Airside Safety responds to a life-or-death medical emergency on an incoming flight. 68 racehorses valued at $300 million dollars arrive from Europe. Overnight, the airside lighting team carry out vital work while dodging planes.

programme.title: Inside Airport: Lost and Found
programme.desc: Airport Lost and Found workers reunite travelers with a dog who wiggled out of his leash upon arrival and wandered the airport grounds for a week, a collection of vintage tennis rackets belonging to a pro tennis player, a purse containing over a hundred dollars in cash, a backpack brimming with lifesaving prescription medicine, a childs beloved stuffed panda bear, and a full Army uniform.

programme.title: Toronto Airport Uncovered
programme.desc: Spring break brings a surge in passenger numbers and added pressures on airport staff and infrastructure: heavy bags rip a section of the baggage conveyor belt which needs fixing before the afternoon rush. A low-cost-holiday jet with millions of miles on the clock needs a new engine. Staff must race passengers from a delayed flight to their jet headed for the Caribbean, and an elite restaurant along with staff on the apron feel the heat as passenger numbers soar.

programme.title: Plane Crash Recreated
programme.desc: Lion Air Flight 610 was just 13 minutes into flight from Jakarta, Indonesia, when it plunged into the sea on 29 October 2018. This was the first fatal aviation accident for the 737 MAX, killing all 189 people on board. Just five months later, tragedy struck again on 10 March 2019, when the 737 Max serving Ethiopian Airlines Flight 302, crashed approximately six minutes after takeoff from Ethiopia, again killing all passengers and crew. What followed was an intense investigation into what caused these two devastating crashes. In this episode former NTSB investigators talk us through how these tragedies could have been avoided..

programme.title: Food Factory USA
programme.desc: On this episode of Food Factory USA: Get the skinny on White Castles cheesecake on a stick; find out what it takes to make a 5,000-pound monster cheese wheel; and these irresistible blondies are shipped to snack-lovers across the country.

programme.title: Food Factory USA
programme.desc: Food Factory USA samples some of Wisconsins favorite foods: Three million deep-fried cheese curds are produced here every day; it takes a mountain of pecans to keep up with demand for these cow patties; and, learn the science behind these pop-in-your-mouth candy crystals.

programme.title: The Infinite Explorer with Hannah Fry
programme.desc: Hannah Fry decodes Spains cultural contradictions. Starting in Madrid, she tries her hand at flamenco and learns how the artform combines both technical discipline and the freedom of improvisation. In Valencia she reveals the origins of paella - a fiercely regional dish that owes its existence to an irrigation system built by invaders from Africa over 700 years ago. In the Canary Islands, where Christoper Colombus first set sail for the Americas, she discovers an ancient whistling language which endured as Spanish conquered the world. Back on the mainland she indulges her love of urban planning in Barcelona, revealing how much of the citys easy charm is built on strict geometric discipline. And in a heart stopping finale, she witnesses the strong community bonds at the heart of gravity-defying human pyramids.

programme.title: The Infinite Explorer with Hannah Fry
programme.desc: Hannah Fry travels to Vietnam, a land of staggering natural beauty, ancient traditions and some of the fastest growing skylines on earth. Over 1,600 km from the vibrant South to the historic North, she uncovers the story of the countrys remarkable post-war transformation. She immerses herself in the moped chaos in Ho Chi Minh City, helps with a muddy prawn harvest in the Mekong Delta and takes a restorative spa bath in the misty hilltops of Sapa. She ushers in the New Year with a local family celebrating the Tet festival and learns how a beloved dish, pho, tells a story of identity. In each place she visits, she meets characters whose lives have been shaped by both war and renewal. What emerges is a nation embracing change, where striking contrasts are balanced by a spirit of cooperation and strong family bonds.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler
programme.desc: AMO Puerto Rico sinks a marine smuggling operation and seizes over 900 kilos of cocaine worth more than $27 million. In San Diego, HSI shuts down a drug cartels tunnel that linked Tijuana to a warehouse in the U.S., while a CBP K9 sniffs out a mixed load of black tar heroin, fentanyl, and meth with a combined street value of $819,000. CBP Atlanta confiscates personal use narcotics from two travelers returning from overseas vacations.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler
programme.desc: HSI agents in Denver trace a shipment of MDMA to France, and work with local law enforcement to bust a dark web drug smuggling operation worth $8 million. Meanwhile, CBP officers in Miami and Fort Lauderdale inspect flights for undeclared gold and currency tied to illicit activity. In Arizona, CBP apprehends a body carrier of fentanyl pills, before discovering a frequent border crosser with $43,500 of fentanyl hidden in their car.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of the Maya Snake Kings
programme.desc: Fascinating documentary series from National Geographic that sheds new light on the mystifying Maya civilisation. With astounding new evidence, scientists, archaeologists and historians have uncovered the complexity and advancement of this Central American civilisation, which lived across southeastern Mexico, Belize, Honduras, El Salvador and Guatemala. These experts have used advanced technology to scour the jungles of Guatemala, discovering approximately 60,000 new structures that reveal the meandering network of infrastructure which connected the Maya people. One of the ruling dynasties of this ancient era were the Snake Kings, who until recently were unknown. These intriguing new discoveries reveal the extent of the Snake Kings power as they even conquered Tikal, the greatest city in Mayan history.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Egypt
programme.desc: In this episode, archaeologists unlock the mysteries of Egypts most famous pharaoh, Tutankhamun. We unearth a long lost box of treasures from inside Tutankhamuns tomb. New technology reveals why this boy kings resting place remained hidden from tomb robbers for thousands of years and we join the team who are tasked with transporting Tutankhamuns priceless treasures, on a one in a lifetime journey through the desert. Whilst a team of archaeologists make a new discovery of a lifetime when they open a 4000-year-old tomb.

programme.title: Dark Secrets of the Sun
programme.desc: It contains 99.9 percent of all the matter in our solar system and sheds hot plasma at nearly a million miles an hour. The temperature at its core is a staggering 27 million degrees Fahrenheit. It convulses, it blazes, it sings. You know it as the sun. Scientists know it as one of the most amazing physics laboratories in the universe. Now, with the help of new spacecraft and Earth-based telescopes, scientists are seeing the sun as they never have before and even recreating what happens at its very center in labs here on Earth. Their work will help us understand aspects of the sun that have puzzled scientists for decades. But more critically, it may help us predict and track solar storms that have the power to zap our power grid, shut down telecommunications, and ground global air travel for days, weeks, or even longer. Such storms have happened before-but never in the modern era of satellite communication. "Dark Secrets of the Sun" reveals a bright new dawn in our understanding of our nearest star-one that might help keep our planet from going dark.

programme.title: Nasca Lines: Ancient Secrets
programme.desc: The great mystery of Perus Atacama Desert: the Nasca Linesone thousand-year-old geoglyphs that are visible only from the air. With the first ever 3-D maps of the iconic lines, and clues from a headless body in a tomb, archaeologists and researchers revealed the geoglyphs were once used as open-air temples where the Nasca supplicated their gods for water and fertility. Employing drones far more advanced than the robotic helicopter used nearly a decade ago, archaeologists have discovered some fifty new geogly

programme.title: Gladiators: Warriors of the Ancient World
programme.desc: 75 BCE, Spartacus, a soldier enslaved by Rome and forced into gladiatorial combat leads fellow gladiators in a daring escape. Disaffected slaves join him, sparking a massive rebellion that defeats Roman legions. His story shows how closely linked gladiators were to the politics of the Roman Republic. Though hes ultimately defeated, his legacy lives on as a symbol of freedom.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation Special Report
programme.desc: With airplane travel becoming increasingly popular in a shrinking world and millions of passengers journeying this way every day, it is helpful to be aware of the potentail dangers involved. This show presents remarkable stories of some of the most catastrophic accidents in aviation history and investigates the causes of the accidents, what effect they had on the industry and the steps taken to ensure that they dont happen in the future. Each stand-alone episode features compelling re-enactments, expert analysis and interviews with those involved. The explanations for the accidents range from the explosive power of decompression to problems with autopilots and computerised control systems to air traffic control errors.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation Special Report
programme.desc: With airplane travel becoming increasingly popular in a shrinking world and millions of passengers journeying this way every day, it is helpful to be aware of the potentail dangers involved. This show presents remarkable stories of some of the most catastrophic accidents in aviation history and investigates the causes of the accidents, what effect they had on the industry and the steps taken to ensure that they dont happen in the future. Each stand-alone episode features compelling re-enactments, expert analysis and interviews with those involved. The explanations for the accidents range from the explosive power of decompression to problems with autopilots and computerised control systems to air traffic control errors.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Egypt
programme.desc: In this episode, archaeologists unlock the mysteries of Egypts most famous pharaoh, Tutankhamun. We unearth a long lost box of treasures from inside Tutankhamuns tomb. New technology reveals why this boy kings resting place remained hidden from tomb robbers for thousands of years and we join the team who are tasked with transporting Tutankhamuns priceless treasures, on a one in a lifetime journey through the desert. Whilst a team of archaeologists make a new discovery of a lifetime when they open a 4000-year-old tomb.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Egypt
programme.desc: Why did the great pharaohs of Egypt abandon the pyramids of Giza and choose a secret cemetery in the Valley of the kings as their burial ground? In the shadow of the pyramids, an extraordinary discovery in a rare 4,5000 tomb. We descend 100 meters underground to investigate the first tomb ever built in the valley, whilst a team from the University of Basel are on the hunt for clues to identify human remains found in looted tombs.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Rome
programme.desc: Hadrians Wall is the biggest structure the Romans ever built. Stretching 73 miles across Britain, it once defined the northern edge of the greatest empire the world had seen. Now experts investigate the Wall, its forts, gatehouses and garrison towns, to reveal how civilisation and culture grew on Romes wild frontier. Their surprising discoveries show what life - and death - were like on the dynamic and ever-changing edge of empire.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Rome
programme.desc: The deadly volcanic eruption that buried Pompeii in AD79 also claimed another victim: Herculaneum. Positioned closer to the Vesuvius crater, this seaside town was covered in ash five times as thick as Pompeii, yet miraculously is even better preserved. Now, the discovery of an intact skeleton here, the first excavated in 25 years, helps investigators piece together the final hours of Herculaneum and unravel why Vesuvius stuck so violently here.

programme.title: Gladiators: Warriors of the Ancient World
programme.desc: 75 BCE, Spartacus, a soldier enslaved by Rome and forced into gladiatorial combat leads fellow gladiators in a daring escape. Disaffected slaves join him, sparking a massive rebellion that defeats Roman legions. His story shows how closely linked gladiators were to the politics of the Roman Republic. Though hes ultimately defeated, his legacy lives on as a symbol of freedom.

programme.title: Gladiators: Warriors of the Ancient World
programme.desc: Spiculus, Neros favourite gladiator, becomes a superstar in Romes brutal arenas. Rewarded with wealth and privilege, he fights for glory as Nero uses lavish games to display his power. After the Fire of 64 CE, Neros spectacles grow grander. When his reign finally collapses, Nero calls for Spiculus to kill him - but dies by his own hand. Spiculuss fate remains a mystery, his legend enduring.

programme.title: Ancient X Files

We descend 100 meters underground to investigate the first tomb ever built in the valley, whilst a team from the University of Basel are on the hunt for clues to identify human remains found in looted tombs.

programme.title: Drain the Oceans
programme.desc: Extreme weather patterns have threatened ships and mariners for centuries. The perfect storm?. towering walls of water, powerful winds and churning seas can overwhelm any ship. What brought down the largest haul of Spanish treasure off the coast of Florida? And whats the truth behind the strange disappearance of the mightiest invasion force of ancient times? Drain the Oceans reveals the secrets of Stormy Seas.

programme.title: Drain the Oceans
programme.desc: Explore a world never seen before - a world hidden under miles of water, the landscape of the ocean bed. Combining the latest scientific data with state of the art CGI computer hardware we reveal some of the worlds sunken mysteries. The Titanic, a WWII sunken battleship and the mysterious Flight 19 lost in the Bermuda Triangle. Using already aired episodes of Drain the Ocean we will be able to highlight each of these sunken treasures and tell their stories.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation Special Report
programme.desc: With airplane travel becoming increasingly popular in a shrinking world and millions of passengers journeying this way every day, it is helpful to be aware of the potentail dangers involved. This show presents remarkable stories of some of the most catastrophic accidents in aviation history and investigates the causes of the accidents, what effect they had on the industry and the steps taken to ensure that they dont happen in the future. Each stand-alone episode features compelling re-enactments, expert analysis and interviews with those involved. The explanations for the accidents range from the explosive power of decompression to problems with autopilots and computerised control systems to air traffic control errors.

programme.desc: With airplane travel becoming increasingly popular in a shrinking world and millions of passengers journeying this way every day, it is helpful to be aware of the potentail dangers involved. This show presents remarkable stories of some of the most catastrophic accidents in aviation history and investigates the causes of the accidents, what effect they had on the industry and the steps taken to ensure that they dont happen in the future. Each stand-alone episode features compelling re-enactments, expert analysis and interviews with those involved. The explanations for the accidents range from the explosive power of decompression to problems with autopilots and computerised control systems to air traffic control errors.

programme.title: Plane Crash Recreated
programme.desc: 12 August, 1985 saw the deadliest single-aircraft accident in aviation history. Japan Airlines Flight 123 was a scheduled domestic passenger flight carrying 524 people from Tokyo to Osaka. Just 12 minutes into the flight, the Boeing 747 jumbo-jet suffered a fatal decompression that ripped off most of the tail. With a total loss of hydraulics, the crew were unable to control the aircraft which tragically crashed into a mountainside. This episode features the account of a widowed partner of one passenger who perished in the crash, on why the grief from the tragedy still lives on..

programme.title: Predator v Prey
programme.desc: A forensic look at how cheetahs hunt their prey, offering new perspectives on the tactics employed by these expert predators when stalking, chasing and bringing down antelope and wildebeest. Following a young cheetah mother over 18-months as she teaches her three cubs the secrets of the hunt.

programme.title: Predator v Prey
programme.desc: Crocodile. A forensic look at how Nile crocodiles hunt, offering new perspectives on the patient and precise tactics they use when ambushing migratory herds of wildebeest and zebra that pass through their territories.

programme.title: Predator v Prey
programme.desc: A forensic look at how polar bears hunt prey, offering new perspectives on the tactics they use to track, stalk and ambush seals, whales and walruses. We follow a mother fighting to feed her two cubs in the harsh polar extremes, and a young male driven by starvation to tackle enormous prey.

programme.title: Predator v Prey
programme.desc: A forensic look at how leopards hunt prey both large and small, offering a new perspective on the way these silent killers stalk and ambush everything from impala to wildebeest and catfish to storks. A female leopard deploys stealth, strength and agility to take down prey on land, in water and from the air.

programme.title: Predator v Prey
programme.desc: Crocodile. A forensic look at how Nile crocodiles hunt, offering new perspectives on the patient and precise tactics they use when ambushing migratory herds of wildebeest and zebra that pass through their territories.

programme.title: National Parks: USA
programme.desc: Along Washington States rugged coast, Olympic National Park protects 1 million acres of diverse habitat. Coastal fog hits glacier-capped mountains, drenching the land in record rainfall and giving rise to temperate rainforests. This unique landscape hosts a rich biodiversity, including the endemic Olympic Marmot, Roosevelt elk, bobcats and one of the last Pacific salmon runs in the lower 48.

programme.title: Predator v Prey
programme.desc: A forensic look at how polar bears hunt prey, offering new perspectives on the tactics they use to track, stalk and ambush seals, whales and walruses. We follow a mother fighting to feed her two cubs in the harsh polar extremes, and a young male driven by starvation to tackle enormous prey.

programme.title: Extraordinary Australia
programme.desc: Australias coastline is a true natural wonder, encompassing a diverse range of bountiful habitats. Coastal seas and lands are realms of epic migrations, mesmerising mating rituals and high stakes battles between predator and prey.

programme.title: Snow Leopard of Afghanistan
programme.desc: Scientists try to catch and notice one of the most beautiful big cats. However they must go to war zones for that.

programme.title: Malika the Lion Queen
programme.desc: Narrated by Hollywood A-Lister actress Angela Bassett and produced by the Emmy-Award-winning producers of Planet Earth II, Blue Planet, and Hostile Planet, we journey with Malika as she deals with the hardships of moving from childhood to adulthood. The lioness must learn to hunt and help protect the pride from deadly intruders.

programme.title: Malika the Lion Queen

programme.title: Built to Survive
programme.desc: Indigenous educator Phil Breslin heads into the mangroves to discover which animal is truly built to survive the mud and muck. He encounters a feisty mud crab with huge pincers and catches a shovel-nosed ray with his bare hands. Finally, Phil faces a creature we all love to hate—the mosquito—and discovers theres more to these tiny bloodsuckers than meets the eye.

programme.title: Built to Survive
programme.desc: Indigenous educator Phil Breslin heads to the mysterious blue depths to discover which animal dominates the sea. His first encounter is with a tiger shark, the notorious hunter shaped like a torpedo and armed with ferocious teeth! Next, Phil dives with a group of magnificent manta rays and listens to the songs of one of the largest creatures on Earth, the majestic humpback whale.

programme.title: Malika the Lion Queen
programme.desc: Narrated by Hollywood A-Lister actress Angela Bassett and produced by the Emmy-Award-winning producers of Planet Earth II, Blue Planet, and Hostile Planet, the story of Malika is one of hardship, loneliness, and determination. programme.title: Built to Survive
programme.desc: Within the Channel Country deserts, Indigenous educator Phil Breslin scours the endless sands to find three animals that not only survive the heat but thrive in unrelenting conditions. Get ready to meet Australias most impressive animals: the perentie, the continents largest lizard; the emu, its fastest flightless bird; and the mighty red kangaroo, the worlds largest marsupial.

programme.title: Strangest Nature
programme.desc: Evolution has created countless wondrous creatures that are colorful, amazing and strange. The darker side of nature reveals some of the most bizarre forms natural selection has produced. Alien animals reveal their otherworldly features. Stick insects disguise even their droppings as twigs, water striders glide on liquid as if defying physics, and dragonfly nymphs strike with spring-loaded jaws while breathing through gills in their abdomen. Beneath the beaches of South Africa, plough snails lie buried, breathing through siphons as they swarm dead flesh in the surf. From kelp forests to freshwater pools, camouflage, mutation, and isolation have created animals that are stranger than fiction.

programme.title: Malika the Lion Queen

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Reality show follows Dutch-born veterinarian Jan Pol, his family and employees everyday. Jan Pol and his wife Diane started their own practice in Weidman, Michigan, Pol Veterinary Services, back in in 1981. Dr Pol takes a good care of every family pet and head of livestock no matter what size or condition and is a true legend in the community. Dr Pol has seen it all, treating numerous patients every single day, his daily routine is more than 12 hours but nothing can stop him from being devoted to his patients.

She must battle her uncles to establish a territory of her own where she can start a family.

programme.title: Cat Attack-Tics
programme.desc: Explore the many ways wild cats go in for the kill. Cats rarely seen in action, such as the marbled cat, the fishing cat and the sand cat, will all be featured in Cat Attack-tics. Classic Nat Geo footage is mixed with high-tech graphics, freeze frames and photo finishes to magnify the killer weaponry.

programme.title: Big Cat Games
programme.desc: THE BIG CAT GAMES is a high-end, high-profile television event that pits the worlds most ferocious land predators against each other in a series of challenges that will push them to the limits of their athletic abilities.

programme.title: Big Cat Planet
programme.desc: Big cats may seem like the ultimate wildlife cliche, but theyre locked in a global battle for survival. Powerful and dangerous, they now clash with humans more than ever. This sweeping safari reveals their resilience and adaptability. Cheetahs hunt from cars, jaguars stalk prey underwater and around boats, and Indias lions prowl city streets. Familiar species and behaviors take on new drama, with revelations that reaffirm why big cats remain natures most formidable predators.

programme.title: Soul of the Cat
programme.desc: Most people in the world who know a domestic cat understand the wild look in their pets eye. This film will look at those thinly veiled behaviors between domestic cats and their wild cousins and ancestors, specifically to draw those parallels and to explain to "owners" what they are seeing when they watch their cat. We will use big cat footage of lions and cheetah hunting and show cats playing or hunting. There will be scenes on cats leaping, landing, running up trees like leopards and all the behavior we are used to seeing in domestic cats, but drawn exactly from the wild equivalent.

programme.title: Built for the Kill
programme.desc: Lions are 400 pounds of muscle, teeth, and claw. Lion cubs are 4 pounds of blind, toothless, fluff-built not to kill, but to breastfeed. Built for the Kill: Lion follows the transformation of a helpless cub into an accomplished killer, exposing real life and death struggles in dramatic second-by-second detail.

programme.title: Big Cat Planet

programme.title: Big Cat Games
programme.desc: THE BIG CAT GAMES is a high-end, high-profile television event that pits the worlds most ferocious land predators against each other in a series of challenges that will push them to the limits of their athletic abilities.

programme.title: Prairie Dog Manor
programme.desc: Follow the exploits of these cute creatures from northern New Mexico. "Prairie Dog Manor" showcases the unique behaviour of these special animals and highlights the different relationships that exist between the clan members from Valles Caldera National Preserve. Beginning with the prairie dogs preparing for the coming winter, Carl and the pups get ready for hibernation. But they face danger from an unlikely source as deadly predators forge an alliance to threaten every dog in the territory. Further episodes explore the mating season when the warm weather arrives and battles commence between the males to earn the right to mate with the females. Soon, the females are pregnant and new pups arrive and the whole cycle starts again.

programme.title: Kingdom of the White Wolf
programme.desc: Join Ronan Donovan, a National Geographic Explorer and photographer, as he takes the viewer on a unique adventure to track down the hard-to-find Arctic wolf. The series follows the year-long travails of a family of Arctic wolves on Ellesmere Island, from the first breaking light after the long winter, through the life-bringing springtime, the fattening summer months and the preparations of autumn. Each episode deals with different obstacles that the wolves face and have to overcome and, along the way, we the various characters and personalities of the animal family are revealed. The show makes good use of intimate footage to make the viewer feel that they are actually there, observing the creatures up close.

programme.title: Built to Survive
programme.desc: Indigenous educator Phil Breslin leaves the Australian mainland to discover which of the island-dwelling animals is truly built to survive. First up, he meets the enigmatic green turtle on the Wellesley Islands. Next, he is on KGari (Fraser Island), where he tracks down a pack of the notorious dingoes. Finally, he encounters the formidable and aptly named death adder snake.

programme.title: Built to Survive
programme.desc: Indigenous educator Phil Breslin dares into the Australian savannah to find the species most built to survive. First is Australias largest bird of prey, the majestic but intimidating wedge-tailed eagle. Next, Phil tracks down one of the worlds deadliest snakes, the coastal taipan. Finally, Phil faces the uniquely Australian frill-necked lizard, a reptile with fascinating defense mechanisms.

programme.title: Cat Wars: Lion vs Cheetah
programme.desc: Caught on tape in Africas wild Serengeti is a stunning act of violence between two top predators. Three cheetahs are brutally attacked by two male lions - the first time an attack like this has ever been filmed. Now, filmmaker Leo Kuenkel, who witnessed the attack, is trying to make sense of it. Was this a once-in-a-lifetime "perfect storm" event? Or do these iconic African cats have a deep-set, sinister reason to fight to the death?

programme.title: Kingdom of the White Wolf
programme.desc: Join Ronan Donovan, a National Geographic Explorer and photographer, as he takes the viewer on a unique adventure to track down the hard-to-find Arctic wolf. The series follows the year-long travails of a family of Arctic wolves on Ellesmere Island, from the first breaking light after the long winter, through the life-bringing springtime, the fattening summer months and the preparations of autumn. Each episode deals with different obstacles that the wolves face and have to overcome and, along the way, we the various characters and personalities of the animal family are revealed. The show makes good use of intimate footage to make the viewer feel that they are actually there, observing the creatures up close.

programme.title: Desert Lions: Surviving At Skeleton Coast
programme.desc: In this true story, lion researcher Dr. Philip Stander follows three orphaned lion cubs from birth to adulthood as they navigate the complexity of survival in one of the worlds most unforgiving environments, Namibias deadly Skeleton Coast. He gets up close and personal to unlock secrets of their world and witness the amazing adaptability of these special cats.

programme.title: Cat Wars: Lion vs Cheetah

programme.title: The Rise of Black Wolf
programme.desc: In Yellowstone National Park, several wolf packs reside and compete for territory and pack leadership. A successful wolf pack survives by keeping order, respecting the hierarchy and obeying the leaders. But among these packs, a dark wolf with an unusual approach appears. Sometimes a loner, often a Casanova, eventually a leader- his surprising recipe for success broadens the definition of "normal" wolf behavior.

programme.title: Desert Lions: Surviving At Skeleton Coast
programme.desc: In this true story, lion researcher Dr. Philip Stander follows three orphaned lion cubs from birth to adulthood as they navigate the complexity of survival in one of the worlds most unforgiving environments, Namibias deadly Skeleton Coast. He gets up close and personal to unlock secrets of their world and witness the amazing adaptability of these special cats.

programme.title: Pride
programme.desc: The story here examines the tactics used by a pride of South African lions as they hunt three distinct prey animals in the Singita Game Reserve. Well analyze the Prides unique strategies as they pursue zebra, impala, and ultimately the tallest land animal, the giraffe.

programme.title: Birth of a Pride
programme.desc: National Geographic Wild. The story follows two males lions who swam across the river from Namibia, and joined up with 2 females in Selinda. This union resulted in 6 cubs who are the core of our story.

programme.title: Man v Lion
programme.desc: Fourth generation big cat tracker Boone Smith has worked in the harshest conditions imaginable, tracking the most elusive cats on the planet. But now he has a new mission that will bring us closer to the action than ever before. In Man v. Lion, only an inch of acrylic will separate Boone from one of the worlds top predators, bringing audiences closer to the African lion than they could ever imagine. The show follows Boone across the Nambiti Game Reserve as he breaks down each stage of a lions kill. Boone tracks a lion coalition as they hunt and search for a mate, ultimately putting him face-to-face with these apex predators.

programme.title: Cat Wars: Lion vs Cheetah
programme.desc: Caught on tape in Africas wild Serengeti is a stunning act of violence between two top predators. programme.title: Critter Fixers: Country Vets: Compilations
programme.desc: At Critter Fixers, the docs make sure all their patients are feline their best. Alfred the cat has allergies, and a cat named Loki has a tail injury. A severely dehydrated stray with feline leukemia steals hearts at the clinic, while another former stray needs eye surgery. The team helps two tiny kittens that were trapped underneath a hot car and an escaped cat recovering from an injury. A hairless sphynx cat has a concerning lump.

programme.title: Critter Fixers: Country Vets: Compilations
programme.desc: The docs at Critter Fixer lend a helping paw to a variety of canine clients. Fifteen small-town celebrity chihuahuas need updated shots after one of their own becomes ill, an adorable puppy steals hearts around the clinic, and another young dog has an unusually large growth. Dr. Hodges helps an Alaskan malamute get its travel papers and attempts to bring a Pomeranian back from the brink. The docs leap into action, trying to save a canine bit by a venomous snake, and perform an emergency C-section to deliver five bulldog puppies.

programme.title: Cat Wars: Lion vs Cheetah

Sometimes a loner, often a Casanova, eventually a leader- his surprising recipe for success broadens the definition of "normal" wolf behavior.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Arvien jauni piedzīvojumi ar Doru! Piebiedrojies drošajai pētniecei Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu brīnumainajos piedzīvojumos - no došanās palīgā dzīvniekiem kopā ar Djego līdz apburtas nāru pasaules glābšanai.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora un Zābaciņš palīdz savai draudzenei kondorei Katalīnai kļūt par lielisku gauču un izglābt Gaučo spēles. Dora un Zābaciņš satiek vienradžu princesi Pilaru un palīdz viņai atgriezties Vienradžu zemē.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Pēkšņi pa nakti pazudušas Barbazū skaistās rozes. Viņš ir drošs, ka vainīga Barbabella. Bet kā lai piedabū viņu atzīties? Barbazū viņai iedod jaunu lelli, kas viņu labāk pieskatīs. // Bērni ģimenes albumā ierauga Lolitas bērnības foto. Barbatētis tādēļ nolemj bērniem pastāstīt par to, kā viņš un Lolita reiz devās ekspedīcijā uz Arktiku.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Bērni pirmoreiz brauks ar vilcienu un nakšņos viesnīcā. Mamma būs ar viņiem, bet tētis atsevišķi vedīs paštaisītos izstrādājumus. Viņiem jāpārdod savi darbiņi ikgadējā lielajā tirdziņā, ja tētis paspēs laicīgi... // Uzsniga sniegs un bērni sarīkoja pikošanos, bet Barbabo uzcēla lielisku sniegavīru. Bet kā lai viņu saglabā, kad paliks siltāks? Sākas sacensības ar laiku...

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Daži dzīvnieki ir biedējoši un šķiet bīstami. Tētis stāsta savu piedzīvojumu, kad viņš ar Lolitu kāpa kalnos un satika vilku. // Rīt ir bērnu pirmā skolas diena, katrs gatavojas citādāk. Pirmā skolas diena ir satraucoša, tik daudz par ko jāpadomā.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Daži dzīvnieki ir biedējoši un šķiet bīstami. Tētis stāsta savu piedzīvojumu, kad viņš ar Lolitu kāpa kalnos un satika vilku. // Rīt ir bērnu pirmā skolas diena, katrs gatavojas citādāk. Pirmā skolas diena ir satraucoša, tik daudz par ko jāpadomā.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbazū krāj ūsainu slavenību bildes. Diemžēl nekur nevar atrast pēdējo: Čārlzu Pakavu-Ūsaini. Viņam ir aizdomas par sazvērestību...

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Reindžere Roza lūdz Rabla komandu salabot Lāču salas tiltu. Kad remontdarbos iejaucas Ātrmeistars, ķepaiņiem jāsatīra viņa radītā nekārtība un jāpasargā lāčus no ātri tuvojošās vētras... ar tantes Celtnes jaunās Būvētavas Bultas palīdzību.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Autokinoteātrī tiek izrādīta jauna Supervāveres filma. Kad Ātrmeistars sarīko kārtējo jezgu, ķepaiņiem jārīkojas, lai glābtu situāciju. Ir Tanšu diena! Vai ķepaiņi paspēs uzbūvēt dāvanu tantei Celtnei?

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni - Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals - suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss - suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi - katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu - sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts - Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni - Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbagudrais pastāsta pārējiem, cik vareni bija Da Vinči izgudrojumi un nu katrs grib izgudrot ko savu. Ģēniju ir maz, bet ir jautri izgudrot. // Bērniem jāizvēlas - doties baseinā vai izbraukt ar riteņiem. Uzreiz izveidojas divas frontes un tikai Barbazū spēj nosvērt izvēles svarus.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbabērniem patīk nakts pasaciņas, bet ne tad, ja tās visu laiku atkārtojas. Barbabella pavada nemierīgu nakti kukaiņu dēļ.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims izzina Rūkoņtaunu, lai atrastu vietu, kur baudīt jautrību vienatnē. Tims un Kaja cenšas sarīkot Pārkijam neaizmirstamu dienu. Kad vētras dēļ Reksiem jāpaliek mājās, viņiem jāizdomā, kā pavadīt laiku.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad stirnai Podziņai jāšķērso Celtnieklīča lidostas skrejceļš, Rabls un komanda zina, kas jābūvē. Rabls un komanda uzbūvē milzu skrituļdēli tantes Celtnes un Rivera šovam. Taču, kad tas zaudē kontroli, suņiem jādzenas pakaļ!

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Celtnieklīcim vajadzīga pasta nodaļa! Bet, kad celtni apsēž vāveres, suņiem jāizdomā risinājums. Rabla komanda izmanto savas būvniecības prasmes, lai pārveidotu super auto mazgātavu un nomazgātu fermeres Zojas sušķīgos dzīvniekus.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora atgriežas ar jauniem, fantastiskiem piedzīvojumiem maģiskajā lietus mežā! Pievienojies visīpašākajam bērnam - pētniekam un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam, kad viņi satiek jaunus draugus! Nekas nav neiespējams! Aiziet!

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbabo, Barbabella un Barbagudrais uzbūvē māju kokā. Barbamamma ir apņēmusies novērst piesārņojumu.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbalala saņem paciņu ar rozā zvēriņiem, ko nosauc par Skvīkijiem. Barbabravo, Barbalala un Barbabo ir apnicis, ka brāļi un māsas par viņiem smejas.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims cenšas būt divos pasākumos reizē. Tims meklē Kajai uzkodu bez purvzāles. Pēc vairākiem zaudējumiem Tija cenšas uzvarēt visās ballīšu spēlēs.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Celtnieklīcī apmetas migrējošu pīļu bars. Rabla komandai jāpalīdz pīlēm uzsākt ceļu uz dienvidiem.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Doras ģimene taisa pinjatu par godu māmiņas dzimšanas dienai, taču tā aizlido! Vai viņi to atradīs, pirms pārnāks māmiņa? Garnadzis nočiepj neredzamības segu un sāk čiept visu pēc kārtas. Dorai viņš jāaptur!

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Arvien jauni piedzīvojumi ar Doru! Piebiedrojies drošajai pētniecei Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu brīnumainajos piedzīvojumos - no došanās palīgā dzīvniekiem kopā ar Djego līdz apburtas nāru pasaules glābšanai.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims un Kaja meklē pludmalē apraktos niekus. Tims atbrīvojas no vecajām lietām, bet drīz saprot, ka ne visam vieta miskastē. Tims, Tija un Tomijs cenšas pārliecināt mammu un tēti par labu mīlulim.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Cūciņa Pepa ir mīļa, ziņkārīga un aktīva pirmsskolniece, kura kopā ar māmiņu, tēti un brālīti Džordžu ik dienu uzzina daudz ko jaunu un aizraujošu. Pepas iecienītākās nodarbes ir rotaļāšanās, pārģērbšanās un lēkāšana pa dubļainām peļķēm, un viņas jautrie piedzīvojumi vienmēr beidzas ar skaļiem smieklu rukšķiem.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Kamēr ģimene veido keramikas izstrādājumus, Barbabravo un Barbagudrais mēģina uzstādīt pasaules rekordu ar siera suflē. Barbapapas nolemj doties uz parku. Kamēr brālis un māsa spēlējas, Barbaliba mēģina visu kontrolēt.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Sekojot iemīļotā detektīva pēdās, Barbabravo meklē noziegumu, kas jāatklāj. Vai viņš spēs atklāt noslēpumaino ledus skulptūras pazušanu? Barbabērni gatavo savu mīļāko varoņu iedvesmotus tērpus, taču varoņi neeksistē bez ļaundariem...

programme.title: Haizivsuns
programme.desc: Maksam ir netipisks mīlulis - Haizivsuns, pa pusei haizivs, pa pusei suns. Sākumā Makss cenšas paturēt Haizivsuni noslēpumā, bet Fogijspringsā mīt viņa draugi, ziņkārīgi kaimiņi un pat Maksa vecāki tomēr pamanīs Maksa jauno labāko draugu.

programme.title: Haizivsuns

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: No Piedzīvojumu līča atbrauc Rokijs, lai apciemotu Rabla komandu. Tieši laikā, lai redzētu Celtnieklīča jauno lācēnu! Kad reindžere Roza lūdz palīdzēt ar celtniecību, Ātrmeistars netīšām iznīcina lāču māju. Ķepaiņiem un Rokijam jāglābj situācija.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbazū gatavs palīdzēt, bet Barbagudrais un Barbabella ļaunprātīgi izmanto viņa labestību un padara viņu traku. Barbazū nejauši atklāj spēju atdarināt Barbatēti. Viņš to izmanto, lai sadalītu darbus brāļiem un māsām. Vai viņi to uzzinās?

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbabērni domā, ka ēdiens spēj likt tiem mainīt krāsu un formu, tāpēc izlemj atrast katram piemēroto ēdienu. Barbabo nav iedvesmas, tāpēc vairs nespēj radīt. Visa ģimene palīdz, iesakot jaunas zīmējumu tēmas.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims Rekss kosmosā: Tiranozaurs Tims, viņa lielais brālis Tomijs, mazā māsa Tija un labākā draudzene triceratopss Kaja bērnizmēra problēmām piemeklē dinozaurizmēra risinājumus kosmosā!

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims novērš Tijas domas no Taskija, kamēr tas mazgājas veļas mašīnā.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Bērni kļūst par vecākiem, un vecāki - par bērniem.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Zābaciņš un Dora dodas uz Banānkalnu, lai nogādātu Isai dāvanu - Zābaciņa apgleznotu puķu podu! Dora kopā ar draugiem rīko dzimšanas dienas pārsteiguma ballīti Garnadzim. Ceļā uz svinībām Garnadzis mēģina nočiept pats savu dāvanu!

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora un Zābaciņš atrod apburošu aksolotla mazuli. Viņi dodas ceļā, lai nogādātu mazo nerātni mājās. Lielais Sarkanais Cālis iekļūst milzīgā burbulī, kurš viņu nes taisnā ceļā uz vulkānu! Lai viņu glābtu, arī Dorai nākas pacelties gaisā.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Cūciņa Pepa ir mīļa, ziņkārīga un aktīva pirmsskolniece, kura kopā ar māmiņu, tēti un brālīti Džordžu ik dienu uzzina daudz ko jaunu un aizraujošu. Pepas iecienītākās nodarbes ir rotaļāšanās, pārģērbšanās un lēkāšana pa dubļainām peļķēm, un viņas jautrie piedzīvojumi vienmēr beidzas ar skaļiem smieklu rukšķiem.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Dullo vecāku" galvenais varonis ir desmit gadus vecs zēns Timijs, kurš dzīvo izdomātā pilsētā Dimsdeilā, un tur viņam neklājas viegli. Timija dzīve ir bēdīga, jo vecāki reti kad ir mājās, viņu pieskata Vikija, 16 gadus veca ļauna auklīte, viņš pastāvīgi tiek apsmiets, viņu moka arī skolotājs Krokera kungs. Bet viss mainās, kad viņam uzrodas divi laumiņu krustvecāki - Kosmo, viņa sieva Vanda un vēlāk - viņu dēls Pufs. Timijs apjauš, ka laumiņu krustvecāki noteiktās robežās spēj piepildīt visas viņa vēlēšanās. Tomēr Timijs vēl ir maziņš un reizēm ievēlas ko tādu, kas netīši noved pie nepatikšanām.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Vectēva Grants īpašā diena! Bet, kad nepieciešama suņu palīdzība, viņiem jāmaina vectēva dienas plāni.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Ķīmiskas villas padara lauku apvidu rožainu. Barbapapas uzbūvē putnu māju, lai pasargātu sasirgušos putnus. Ieraugot piesārņotu pludmali, Barbapapu ģimene izlemj to uzkopt. No drazām top mini golfa laukums.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Vērojot zvaignzes Barbatētis un Lolita pamana lidojošo šķivīti un steidz pamodināt visu ģimeni. Izrādās, ka ciemos atlidojuši draugi, kuriem līdzi ir lielkājains mazulis, kurš pēkšņi uzradās viņu planētā. Ģimene ar kosmosa kuģi dodas mazuļa planētas meklējumos. // Barbatētis cer, ka viņi drīz atradīs mazuļa planētu. Bet ne viss iet pēc plāna un viņi nolaižas uz ļoti dīvainas planētas. Kā viņi tiks prom un vai atradīs mazuļa planētu?

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs, Tija un omīte ir dārgumu meklējumos. Ir Rūkoņas svētki, un Tims grib, lai viņa rūciens ir labākais. Tims, Tomijs un Tija savā mājā atrod pazudušu mamutu.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims izliekas, lai pierādītu, ka ir tikpat foršs, cik Kajas brālēns.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa un Džordžs šodien dodas uz trusītes Rebekas māju. Tā atšķiras no Pepas mājas. Tā ir kalnā, kurā kāpņu vietā ir tuneļi. Viņi spēlējas, un visi ir pārsteigti, kad Džordžs atklāj, ka viņam garšo burkāni.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Aita Sūzija izdomājusi draugu Lauvu Leo. Pepa neredz Leo, bet Sūzija saka, ka Leo patīk rēkt un pārģērbties. Pepa nolemj, ka tagad viņa redz Leo. Pat mamma un tētis tagad spēlē līdzi. Džordžs jūtas atstumts.

programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Reindžere Roza lūdz Rabla komandu salabot Lāču salas tiltu. Kad remontdarbos iejaucas Ātrmeistars, ķepaiņiem jāsatīra viņa radītā nekārtība un jāpasargā lāčus no ātri tuvojošās vētras... ar tantes Celtnes jaunās Būvētavas Bultas palīdzību.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Komanda uzbūvē staciju tieši laikā, lai sagaidītu fermeres Zojas jauno gotiņu.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora un Zābaciņš satiek Garnadzi un viņa krustdēlu Foksiju. Viņiem jānokļūst mājās, pirms Garnadzis un Foksijs pagūst nočiept spēļu lācīti. Dora satiek Zābaciņa māsīcu Cepurīti, un viņi dodas lietusmežā, lai meklētu īpašos zilos banānus.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Vecmamma rāda Dorai fotoalbumu ar putnu bildēm. Tomēr albumā vēl trūkst Fiksadū fotogrāfijas. Dora apņemas atrast un nofotografēt ašo putnu. Dora un Zābaciņš palīdz papagailēnam atgriezties mājās - taču ceļā putnēns nebeidz mēdīties!

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbagudrais uztvēris melodiju no Marsa. Barbapapas būvē raķeti, lai dotos uz sarkano planētu. Ceļā uz Marsu Barbapapas sastop Barbamarsiešu ģimeni. Viņiem nav laika iepazīties, kad ciemam uzbrūk milzu augs.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbagudrais uztvēris melodiju no Marsa. Barbapapas būvē raķeti, lai dotos uz sarkano planētu. Ceļā uz Marsu Barbapapas sastop Barbamarsiešu ģimeni. Viņiem nav laika iepazīties, kad ciemam uzbrūk milzu augs.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbamazuļi atrod ziloņu mazuli un slepeni par to rūpējas. Kā Barbatētis un Barbamamma reaģēs uz Borisu? Zilonis Boriss ilgojas pēc mājām. Barbapapas nolemj vest viņu atpakaļ uz Āfriku. Turpat viņi palīdz Borisam pielāgoties.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Kamēr ģimene veido keramikas izstrādājumus, Barbabravo un Barbagudrais mēģina uzstādīt pasaules rekordu ar siera suflē. Barbapapas nolemj doties uz parku. Kamēr brālis un māsa spēlējas, Barbaliba mēģina visu kontrolēt.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Pastaigas laikā Barbapapas atrod megalītu.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabla komanda palīdz Riveram uzņemt daudz fotogrāfiju foto konkursam, uzbūvējot ļoti ātru veidu, kā pārvietoties pa Celtnieklīci. Rabls un ķepaiņi palīdz Karlam pagatavot saldējumu visiem. Ja vien Ātrmeistars viņiem netraucēs...

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Ir Draudzības diena! Kad Ātrmeistara dāvana Makrupuča kungam noiet greizi, viņam jālūdz Rabla komandas palīdzība. Rabla komanda palīdz Lūkasam uzbūvēt lieliskāko Zinātnes izstādes vulkānu. Vai Vingsija stāsies izvirduma ceļā?

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbagudrais pārklāj māju ar burvju produktu, lai novērstu ūdens sūci. Nākamajā dienā māja saplok kā balons. Putns uzvij ligzdu uz Barbazū vēdera. Barbazū grib kļūt par lieu koku, lai sniegtu patvērumu dzīvniekiem. Situācija kļūst sarežģīta.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbabo, Barbabella un Barbagudrais uzbūvē māju kokā. Barbamamma ir apņēmusies novērst piesārņojumu.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims nolemj pierādīt, ka Kajas tētis ir kapteinis Dinostārs. Tims cenšas atpūsties, bet Tijai ir citi plāni. Tims nopērk labākos cepumus pilsētā, bet drīz saprot, ka citiem tos vajag vairāk nekā viņam.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabla komanda strādā, lai pārvērstu Celtnieklīča pludmales promenādi spožā, svinīgā ziemas brīnumzemē. Kad sniegota diena izjauc Motores un Miksas Virpuļvāveres plānus, Rabla komanda dara to, ko prot vislabāk... būvē.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Celtnieklīcī tiek uzbūvēta pirmā viesnīca, kad ciemos atbrauc fermeres Zojas brālēns Hedlijs. Kad juceklis uz dabas takas apmulsina visus Dakija Dū kunga dzimšanas dienas ballītes viesus, ķepaiņi viņiem palīdz atrast ceļu.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora atgriežas ar jauniem, fantastiskiem piedzīvojumiem maģiskajā lietus mežā! Pievienojies visīpašākajam bērnam - pētniekam un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam, kad viņi satiek jaunus draugus! Nekas nav neiespējams! Aiziet!

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Dvīņi ciemojas Barbagudrā istabā. Kādus sapņus sasniegtu, ja es būtu miljardieris?

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Ceļojumā uz Parīzi ģimene apskatīs lielisko Luvru. Diemžēl Barbalala neievēro strikto noteikumu - muzejā neēst. // Barbalala strikti ievēro ačgārnās dienas tradīcijas, kas cēlušās no seniem laikiem. Brāļi un māsas pievienojas viņai ačgārnajā dienā.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims dara visu, lai tiktu pie jaunās Dinozvaigznes figūriņas. Ir Astro-joku diena, bet Tims nezina, kad apstāties. Timam un tētim jānoķer traucējošs kurmis.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un viņa ķepaiņu celtnieku ģimene pārceļas uz kaimiņpilsētu Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, rotaļājas un būvē visu kopienai nepieciešamo.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Isu apciemos Rāpuļu karaliene, bet dārzā valda nekārtība! Dora palīdz Isai gatavoties Karalienes vizītei. Dora iepazīstas ar sliņķi Semiju, kuram jāpagūst laikus nokļūt dienas nometnē, lai visus pārsteigtu.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Arvien jauni piedzīvojumi ar Doru! Piebiedrojies drošajai pētniecei Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu brīnumainajos piedzīvojumos - no došanās palīgā dzīvniekiem kopā ar Djego līdz apburtas nāru pasaules glābšanai.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims un Tomijs cenšas izaudzēt vislielāko astro-ķirbi.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims un Tomijs izpalīdz Dino-veikalā.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Omīte uzadīja Timam cepuri, taču tā nemitīgi traucē.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Cūciņa Pepa ir mīļa, ziņkārīga un aktīva pirmsskolniece, kura kopā ar māmiņu, tēti un brālīti Džordžu ik dienu uzzina daudz ko jaunu un aizraujošu. Pepas iecienītākās nodarbes ir rotaļāšanās, pārģērbšanās un lēkāšana pa dubļainām peļķēm, un viņas jautrie piedzīvojumi vienmēr beidzas ar skaļiem smieklu rukšķiem.

Pepas iecienītākās nodarbes ir rotaļāšanās, pārģērbšanās un lēkāšana pa dubļainām peļķēm, un viņas jautrie piedzīvojumi vienmēr beidzas ar skaļiem smieklu rukšķiem.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbabērni laimē skārienpaliktni. Visi grab to izmantot, tāpēc čiepj viens pēc otra. Barbazū krāj ūsainu slavenību bildes. Diemžēl nekur nevar atrast pēdējo: Čārlzu Pakavu-Ūsaini. Viņam ir aizdomas par sazvērestību...

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbabo aizmirsa nodot bibliotēkas grāmatu. Bibliotekārs Misters Stingrais šodien ciemojas pie Barbatēta, tāpēc Barbabo izlemj aizbēgt. Barbamamma grib, lai barbabērni uzkopj savas istabas. Viņi slēpjas, lai izvairītos no garlaicīgā darba.

programme.title: Haizivsuns
programme.desc: Maksam ir netipisks mīlulis - Haizivsuns, pa pusei haizivs, pa pusei suns. Sākumā Makss cenšas paturēt Haizivsuni noslēpumā, bet Fogijspringsā mīt viņa draugi, ziņkārīgi kaimiņi un pat Maksa vecāki tomēr pamanīs Maksa jauno labāko draugu.

programme.title: Haizivsuns
programme.desc: Maksam ir netipisks mīlulis - Haizivsuns, pa pusei haizivs, pa pusei suns. Sākumā Makss cenšas paturēt Haizivsuni noslēpumā, bet Fogijspringsā mīt viņa draugi, ziņkārīgi kaimiņi un pat Maksa vecāki tomēr pamanīs Maksa jauno labāko draugu.

programme.title: Haizivsuns
programme.desc: Maksam ir netipisks mīlulis - Haizivsuns, pa pusei haizivs, pa pusei suns. Sākumā Makss cenšas paturēt Haizivsuni noslēpumā, bet Fogijspringsā mīt viņa draugi, ziņkārīgi kaimiņi un pat Maksa vecāki tomēr pamanīs Maksa jauno labāko draugu.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Gatavojoties Banānu dienai, Gabrielam un Sjerrai Spīdošajai vajag būvnieku palīdzību, tāpēc Rabla komanda ķeras pie darba. Bākuguns vietā Ātrmeistars izgaismo debesis ar savu seju, kad tas nogādā kuģi nepatikšanās, ķepaiņi steidz palīdzēt.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad Ātrmeistars nozog Rabla komandas autobusu, ķepaiņiem tas jāatgūst, lai paspētu uz Sjerras Spīdošās koncertu. Celtnieklīcī ir lieliska diena pludmalei! Rabla komandai jābūvē glābēju tornis, lai pludmalē būtu aboslūti droši.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Vecākus pārsteidz aizvien vairāku reklāmas izkārtņu parādīšanās gar viņu ceļu. Gaisma no reklāmām ir tik spoža, ka naktī vairs nevar saskatīt zvaigznes un visur ir tik daudz stabu! Pietiks! Ģimenei jārīkojas! // Barbalala vēlas kļūt par kovbojmeiteni un Barbazū ir apņēmies viņai palīdzēt. Lai to panāktu, viņai jāiemācās aprūpēt govis un bulli. Tas nav viegli, bet, ja viņa pacentīsies, viņa būs lieliska kovbojmeitene.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbagudrais pastāsta pārējiem, cik vareni bija Da Vinči izgudrojumi un nu katrs grib izgudrot ko savu. Ģēniju ir maz, bet ir jautri izgudrot. // Bērniem jāizvēlas - doties baseinā vai izbraukt ar riteņiem. Uzreiz izveidojas divas frontes un tikai Barbazū spēj nosvērt izvēles svarus.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs, Tija un tētis netiek prom attāla asteroīda. Tims, Kaja un Tomijs cenšas dabūt laukā bumbu no mammas istabas. Tims cenšas dabūt lejā Tijas jauno balonu, kas ieķēries kokā.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims izmēģina jaunus raķešzābakus, kas drīz kļūst nekontrolējami.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs un Tija pieskata mēness papagaili.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Isa rīko ballīti, kurā visi dejos Mūžameža ritmu. Ceļā uz svētkiem Zābaciņam jāpagūst iemācīties dejas soļus! Dora ar draugiem dodas uz Likstu un Lamatu Mežu, lai atrastu Tiko burvju riekstu, kurš spēj pārvērsties par ikviena mīļāko našķi.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora rāda dvīņiem mūzikas lādīti, kuras mazā dejotāja atdzīvojas! Kad aizbēg viņas burvju zābaciņi, draugi dodas tos meklēt. Saule nevar iemigt, tāpēc atsakās norietēt! Dorai jāatrod Spilvenmākonis, lai Saule varētu doties pie miera.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Ceļot skeitparku, komanda sastopas ar problēmu.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbabo neprot zīmēt. Viņam piemetas žagas, no kurām netiek vaļā. Viņš jau grasās padoties, kad nejauši rada jaunu mākslas novirzienu. Barbaliba grib piedalīties rakstīšanas konkursā, taču brāļi un māsas neļauj koncentrēties.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Bērniem ir garlaicīgi, jo ārā līst lietus. Bet vecāki zina, ka vajag tikai nedaudz iztēles, lai varētu izklaidēties aŗī lietū. Bērniem iztēle ir lieliska, varbūt pat pārāk... // Barbagudrais radīja dekoderi, kurš spēj iztulkot dzīvnieku skaņas, bet dzīvnieki fermā un pagalmā neko interesantu nesaka. Barbazū lūdz iztulkot okeāna iemītnieku valodu.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims cenšas būt divos pasākumos reizē. Tims meklē Kajai uzkodu bez purvzāles. Pēc vairākiem zaudējumiem Tija cenšas uzvarēt visās ballīšu spēlēs.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tomijs piedalās raķešu sacīkstēs, Tims atbalsta savu brāli.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa ar draugiem dodas pārgājienā kopā ar Gazeles jaunkundzi. Kad satumst, viņi visi dzied pie ugunskura. Kad laiks iet gulēt, Pepa ar draugiem ir nobijušies, un visi bērni dodas gulēt Gazeles jaunkundzes teltī.
